You can find just about anything online that's positive or negative about it though, and it can make your head spin into trying other things that may be cleaner—from its cult following of celebrity users who swear by it, to its too expensive, to it's not clean (hello mineral oil), blah blah blah. Don't do what I did and get caught up!! Do yourself a favor and just try it. It's probably not for everyone's skin BUT if you have a fair complexion and live in an extremely dry climate, this will become your holy grail. When I stopped using this cream, hormonal acne and rosacea started. I even went to a derm and was put on doxycycline for a couple of months. ZERO improvements in redness, acne, large pores, or pigmentation. After the round of antibiotics not working, the derm wanted to put me on more pills. I went home and decided to go back to basics. I had a small amount of La Mer I found in my drawer and was like ok, what do I have to lose. And boy, was I on the hook to become a lifelong user of this magician of a moisturizer. In about 15 days since I started using it again, all of the inflammation and redness from the rosacea is gone entirely. I had my monthly cycle and only got 1 cystic zit and zero inflammation/redness. The texture of my skin is improving, my pores are way smaller, and the hyperpigmentation on my cheeks is slowly starting to disappear with every use. I am a forever La Mer believer now and this cream will never leave my routine again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is like no other for dry skin. I have autoimmune issues and my skin can become sensitive and dry. I put it on at night only , first you warm it in the palm of your hand. I use my finger to swirl it until it emulsified and then apply it to my face. I wake up hydrated and soothed. It’s also good for the skin around dry eyes. I always switch back to this cram in the fall and winter months when I need more hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry skin and live so far north in New England that I’m practically in Canada. La Mer is one of the only things that keeps my skin in good shape during the harsh winters. It’s expensive, which is why I took off a star, but it does last me a long time. It’s not something everyone needs, but if you have super dry skin and want one product to fix it, this is it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this zero stars if I could. I got a sample of this since the price alone I would never in my life purchase this. I was excited to try it since it’s so high end. Immediately when opened I noticed that it smells almost identical to Nivea cream. Then I put it on and the consistency is almost identical to Nivea cream (maybe this is a little thicker). I wore it once or twice within a few days and broke out like crazy. I have oily skin so, this was definitely way too greasy - same reason o never liked Nivea lol. It’s literally WAY over priced Nivea cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I do not like it.It has a smell that I don't like.  The skin is white and a little sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don't let sticker shock put you off. If you can afford a jar, not only will it last you a long time, but it truly delivers on clear and beautiful skin! Its a different consistency to almost any other moisturizers, but once you get used to it you will love it and never go back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Healed my minor burns + scars. If you put on a sunburn it will fade overnight. Also, skin is so hydrated after using. Been using sparingly on my body for years, and no one I’ve turned on to it has been disappointed…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample recently and it’s amazing.  My skin looks much plumper and dewy and feels hydrated.  I thought this product was all hype, but it delivers.  I will purchase in the future when I get low on my very generously sized sample jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have always heard how amazing this cream is. I was not disappointed (unfortunately!!) I’m definitely going to be repurchasing. I’ll have to get a part time job to support this habit lol! Really hydrates and makes your skin so fresh looking. Not to mention, smells so lovely and feels so luxurious. Spoiled for all others now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a 7mL sample size through a promo and I thought I wouldn’t be impressed - I’ve been disappointed by other luxury brands before. But sweet baby jesus. I tested it out for a week without any other products just to see if a good rich cream could replace my arsenal.   I look five years younger and I’m only 27!!!, my pores are the smallest they’ve ever been, and my skin is just bouncing. I had a lot of acne scars left over from about 6 months ago when I got that under control with better skincare and overall wellness, I was about to launch myself into retinol treatments to renew my skin. I don’t even need to anymore. I was not expecting this at all.   I don’t know if I’ll ever use this regularly because of the price tag, but if I want to make the jump at least I know now it’s the real thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I always finding myself back to using this cream because it just really works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only use this on my eyes as it is LITERALLY the ONLY cream that doesn't irritate my eyes and stays on for hours after application. I realize that this is not an eye cream, but I have tried every top-rated eye cream, and all others irritate my eyes to some degree and/or are thin and evaporate quickly.

reviews.review_title: Only moisturizer for my dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and this is so far the best moisturizer I’ve used. I got the baby sample so I will be buying the big size. I put it on after a shower/exfoliation and my skin is SO SOFT! Waking up in the morning with soft skin that shines a bit makes my makeup application seamless. This is it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Finally tried it.  it works ok.  I don't see improvements.  Other products around $100 work kind of the same on me.

reviews.review_title: Finally tried,  not seeing the results
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product after it being recommended by a dermatologist. Yes, it has moisture properties. I do not like the medicinal smell. I would probably like it much better if it had a better fragrance. You must rub between your fingers to warm it before you apply it. That activates the broth. It also makes the application easier. I moved to PTR products because of it's smell. I just cannot have a nice clean face and then apply a medicinal smell. It would be rated higher if they changed the fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ugh. Sigh. I love the smell of this product. At first it was hard to rub into my face so i looked into their technique. It worked a lot better at moisturizing my skin but i whole heartedly feel like i paid 400$ for teenage acne. I would be shocked if someone said they used this and didn’t see new HUGE PIMPLES. I’ve had this for 4 months and have used it less than ten times. It is a novelty item in my opinion, looks nice on my vanity but horrible for your skin.  I do really like the soft cream though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The creme de la mer really does do what it says it will do- It is very thick so a little bit goes a long way- I pat it on the lines on my forehead, around my eyes and those long ugly mouth to chin lines. It literally lessens the look of the lines especially around my eyes- and was desperate for something new to try. I am happy to say (thanks to first trying a sample) Gifted by la mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using La Mer in 1990. Others noticed the difference in my skin first. I was so ready to unbelieve! By way of exercise, I tried it out 5 times on my boyfriend, the contractor. Same thing. He became a total La Mer snob.   The best way to notice its affect is if you don't use it. And there were points whwre I couldn't afford it. But i always come back to it.   La Mer is a healer. But you still have to do the 'do' things. Please don't smoke. Drink water. And love.   I am 68 in 2 months. Most people are shocked. And I did a lot of very naughty things. Respect yourself. Go with the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this complimentary from La Mer. Definitely for dry skin types; whereas mine is between combination and normal. I'm sure it may be holy grail product for dry skin. Although I still can't justify the hefty price tag for such a small amount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You have to warm it in your hands first, but even then it didn’t layer well over my other products. After an hour or so it just felt super oily and tacky on my face. Not a great texture at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from La Mer for my honest review. I cannot stress this enough, Crème de la Mer is the absolute best moisturizer  I have ever used. I have oily skin and I use it as a nighttime moisturizer.  Full of high quality ingredients, this rich, luxurious product never disappoints. Crème de la Mer restores my skin every night. After a strenuous day, my skin looks dull and angry. I just warm in my fingertips and apply a thin layer(a little goes a long way). It's like a reset for my skin. It's renewed, bright and the redness of the previous day is gone. Worth every  penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Creme de La Mer worked wonders on my dry skin. This moisturizer left my skin feeling hydrated all day. It was very easy to apply. Just rub a small amount between your fingers until it is translucent and then press gently into your skin. A little really does go a long way so the jar lasts a good amount of time. The Miracle Broth healing elixir made my skin look more vibrant. I received this product complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream. It's so smooth and full of moisturizing. I think it's good for dry to normal to combination skin, but it's not for oily skin cause they gonna feel heavy base in the face, which is not good for oily skin. Best for all weather. I got it complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by La Mer. A great product no doubt. But not right for me. I have combo to oily skin depending on the time of year, but my skin still loves to be hydrated. This product never seemed to really sink into my skin fully. It felt rich but almost oily. Also the fragrance is very strong. I would not personally repurchase this product. But if you have dry skin and don’t mind fragrance, this might be a good option for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by La Mer. The first thing I notice is the very strong fragrance. Not sure why luxury skincare is usually loaded with fragrance. The cream itself though, I quite like. You need to warm it up in your hands before applying it, but it turns into an almost oil texture. It is pricey but a little does go a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The cream is very rich and thick. I rub it between my fingers until it’s translucent to activate the cream. So rich and smooth and makes skin feel heaven. I use this twice daily after cleansing. My complexion appears firmer and more moisturized. I use it right after my serum step in the morning and the evening.My skin stays moisturized and the cream doesn’t feel oily or greasy. This cream works like magic! Once I'm done with this jar, I will definitely be repurchasing. Complimentary from La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from La Mer. I was really hoping that I wouldn’t like this due to the cost, but it didn’t turn out that way. It left my skin feeling so soft, moisturized, and glowy. As someone who has dry skin to the point of bleeding in winter...this is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by La Mer. I love all things La Mer makes that I’ve tried. This is a good brand. The thick moisture cream has a pleasant aroma that is light and crispy. Hold it between your thumb and finger until it turns translucent before applying. It leaves a beautiful feeling on your skin and lasts for a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream makes me dry skin drier and oily t zone oilier. I’ve gotten new blackheads everyday after using this and my dry skin started flaking. I wish I could get a refund because this is the dumbest cream I’ve ever used in my life

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cream for its moisture, however when I use it after prolonged times it makes me get those little milia — and when I stopped using it I didn’t get new ones any longer.  But ur skin might not do that and the moisturizing is great—

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for a week and definitely seen results for my pores. I usually apply it before go to bed. It is little oily but it is So far so good.  I've used many creams and this has given me faster results. Only downfall is the price but I would still recommend. This is gifted by La mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks for sending this complimentary from La Mer to give me a chance to try out this amazing famous moisturizing cream! After trying this cream, the first night, I woke up with bright and ultra-soft skin! That was unbelievable! I love the result right away!  My combination skin quickly became hydrated, and some dry area in my forehead went away. The cream was thick, but after warming it in hands and patting gently, it absorbed quickly, without any residue, that is nice! I felt my skin was so smooth and breathable! A small pea sized amount was all I needed to put it on , even it seems expensive, but it will last long time! after I applied ,my skin was moisturized and not greasy. I have mild acne and at the time was suffering from a break out - I couldn't believe in the morning that the pimples had noticeably calmed down in both size and redness. This cream is a miracle! Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There is a trick to using this moisturiser. Follow the directions: rub between fingers until 'damp' then PAT GENTLY onto skin. Do not start rubbing it onto your face right out of the container. RTFM needs to come back in vogue because we're not  good at reading anything anymore--instructions, articles, labels--but that's a review for another day!   Another thing to remember is this is for really dry skin. If you've relatively 'normal' skin in relatively moderate weather (ie, not tropical, not desert) you are not going to see miraculous results. If you have relatively young skin as well as the above? You are not going to see miraculous results.   It's not as thick as it seems when used properly, though it is intensely moisturising. It's wonderful in winter. I also use it during The Allergy Months as it helps when my skin gets red, scratchy, and irritated. It's nice on cuticles, dry knuckles and elbows. I use it only when I need it, but it can be used as a routine moisturiser as well.   Essentially, the right moisturiser for the job! ^_~

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with oily to combo skin; I found this moisturizer a little too thick for my skin. Received complimentary from LaMer, love it on my hands though. I also avoid fragranced skincare and this is loaded with fragrance. when they say Nivea cream is a dupe for it, it feels and smells exactly like it. won't be my preferred moisturizer even if it was at a fraction of cost instead of the $$$.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to give this a fair try. After using it for a month, I didn’t see any noticeable changes. It was thick and took a while to absorb into my skin. I have combination skin and it did not hydrate well enough for me. The cost for results does not mesh. If I’m being completely honest, this cream gave me the same results as the cold cream from Nivea that I sneak from my mom in high school. I don’t get the hype. There are cheaper creams that have far better results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been try this cream and I am honestly not that impressed. The ingredient deck is nothing special in comparison to similar creams. It does feel nice but I wouldn’t reach for it over other, less expensive creams. The fragrance is a little old school in my opinion. A sample was gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received 2 travel size La Mer moisturizing creams complimentary from La Mer.  Although unconfirmed, I’ve heard of the stories about the astrophyscist who formulated this product to heal the burns he had in a lab accident. It took him 12 years and 6000 experiments to research and formulate this. It is said that every jar of Creme de La Mer contains some of the original batch in it.   The key ingredients in this cream are lime tea to help protect skin against the environment and sea kelp which help your skin heal.    The cream is very rich and thick. To use, I rub it between my fingers until it’s translucent to activate the cream. I then press it on my face without rubbing  or spreading it. I use this twice daily after cleansing, after essence water and serum. My complexion appears firmer and more moisturized. Although the cream is absorbed into my skin, I can feel a protective layer on top of my skin. This is helpful in the winter when the weather is harsh. Since it’s so thick and rich,  it’s best for people with dry or normal skin. If you have oily skin, it might be too rich for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This creams really lives up to the hype. It was gifted by La Mer The entire experience from the scent to the texture feels so luxurious. It's nice and rich but doesn't feel greasy on the skin. I really need to get a bigger jar now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted complimentary from La Mer for review. For the price I do not think this product is worth it. It’s a thick cream that doesn’t apply easily without tugging on your skin. It reminds me of the Nivea cream in the blue tin - a basic, old fashioned drug store cream that hasn’t been updated in decades. Smells outdated as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary sample from Lamer of Créme de LaMer as a gift in exchange for my honest opinion.  Créme de LaMer is a rich and luxurious moisturizing cream that leaves my skin feeling completely hydrated and totally pampered. I love the process of melting it between my fingers. Watching it go from a thick cream to a buttery smooth moisturizer. My skin soaks it in and it feels plump and nourished. I use this in my nighttime skin care routine and by morning my skin looks and feels moisture rich and replenished. Gifted by La Mar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am enjoying the moisturizing cream I received complimentary from La Mer. Make sure to rub it between your hands first until clear and then pat on your face my skin felt soft and looked bright. Unfortunately it’s rather expensive so I probably won’t buy in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this cream gifted by La Mer. I have been using this moisturizer for a week now and I have seen big changes in my skin.  To apply it, I first put an amount on my fingers and heat it between them, until it becomes translucent on them.  Then I apply it to my face, pressing my fingers against my skin.  My skin is super dry and it has helped me a lot to keep my face hydrated and luminous.  It has helped me reduce the appearance of fine lines and scars that I have from a dog bite when I was little.  I love that it doesn't take a lot of product to see results, which is good because the product lasts quite a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the .25 size if the Sephora favs. I have tried absolutely every moisturizer, not kidding. Since covid my priority has been, trying just about everything Sephora has I'm needing in my life currently.  lots of hit and misses. But this is NOT one of them. It simply absorbs into my skin so perfectly.  Not clumping or peeling off like others. I absolutely love this! So finally, I've found the PERFECT MOISTURIZER THAT DOES EVERYTHING I NEED. I'm very sensitive,  zero issue's.  I use pure retinol. 03%, and no matter what, it would make my skin peel. Not now. This is a skin saver. So you see that price and keep scrolling. But I'll tell you. After you use it. You will not go back to any other. Use it as directed. The warm feeling it has when you warm it up first like it says before applying it feels great. You feel it working as it melts into your skin. You face never felt so soft.  A MUST TRY FOR SURE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to get  gifted  by La Mer,  Creme de la Mer because I’ve read great reviews in past. I’m happy I wasn’t let down. The texture was rich and it left my skin moisturized. The scent was nice and subtle which I love. Now I get the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The luxury La Mer original facial moisturizer is in a word—-decadent. It’s thick, rich, lush, and has a gorgeous high-end fragrance that envelops the skin but isn’t overpowering. My favorite thing about this moisturizer is that a tiny bit goes a very long way and though it does have a hefty price tag it’s worth it based on value and quality. It soaks in after warming on the fingertips and leaves my aging (almost 40, gasp) hydrated (but never greasy), plumped and feeling smooth. This is one I will definitely add to my everyday skin-care routine and will be recommending to friends. I received this luxury sample as a gift from La Mer in exchange for my honest review of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finally got to try the most coveted moisture that was gifted by La Mer. I was really curious to see if it was worth the hype or not. My first reaction was that it looked like a super heavy cream and was afraid I was going to look greasy afterwards. But it said that a little goes a long way so I did to made sure to follow the directions to avoid looking so oily. I pressed it into my skin and applied my makeup as normal to test how it would look throughout the day, and to my surprise it did not cause me to look extremely oily or cause my makeup to separate! Overall I was satisfied with the way the product delivered, however the price is steal on the high side for me but since you’re not using much it may last a while and make it worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This original formula is iconic for a reason. I got myself hooked 15 years ago and now my skin rejects anything else like a mismatched organ transplant. Warm per directions, use nightly on clean skin and say goodbye to menopausal acne, reduce fine lines/marionette mouth. It’s my only non-negotiable expensive beauty item, and you can make a tablespoon last a month. Nobody thinks I’m 50, and that’s FINE BY ME. No shade to my silver sisters, but why look older than you have to, knowhatimean?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by  La Mer and it is one of the best moisturizers I have used. Soft, smells good and non sticky, with rich amount of hydration for healthy skin. I would definitely continue using it after sample

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so very excited to write this review about one of my favorite products, so generously gifted to me in exchange for my honest review from La Mer and Octoly. I have to be honest, I really love this cream. I have tried it a few times in the past but unfortunately I was using it wrong. Per the company you are supposed to warm the cream in between your fingers before applying which I never did in the past. Let me tell you, it soaks right in if you use it correctly and warm it up first. This cream lasts a very long time and a little goes a long way. I enjoy the way it feels. It doesn't leave me greasy at all which is a plus for me as I have combination skin that can get oily closer to my period. It hasn't exasperated my hormonal acne and in fact it seems to have helped as jt keeps my skin balanced and my face doesn't feel the need to overcompensate.  It's also completely healed the dry patches on my chin, which really bothered me. It is expensive but since it lasts such a long time, to me the cost is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first experience with Creme De La Mer, and I am thrilled with it. I received the complimentary sample from La Mer and could not believe how little of a cream it takes to cover my whole face. The La Mer moisturizing cream takes it to a new level. This cream is very easy to use and apply. As soon as you apply the cream to your face, you can feel the moisture(kind of like a cooling effect). It makes my face feel hydrated and very smooth. It is not too thick and doesn’t feel oily. I also noticed that my face looks brighter than before.  The only thing that I would improve is the scent of it. I love when my face cream has a ”spa” kind of scent. This one, unfortunately, didn't meet my expectations(scent-wise). Overall, I like it a lot and would recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always like to use a new product for two weeks before writing a review. That way my skin has time to adjust. I’ve always wanted to try La Mer creme and am so happy I was able to.  First, this creme is a heavier creme so, I only used it at night. I followed the directions and let the creme warm in my hand and turn translucent before applying. Since this creme is so heavy, a little bit goes a long way. My skin absorbed the creme as I gently patted it on my skin.  After two weeks of use, my skin is softer and smoother. While, yes, it is a bit pricey, you get what you pay for. In my opinion, it’s worth the money. I also believe that since you only need a small amount per application, a small container should last quite awhile.   I received this product complimentary of La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer. Before use, I made sure to watch a couple of videos on how to apply the product to your skin.  Mary Phillips does a really good demo on why and how to warm the product up between your hands - to break down the broth until the cream is translucent and press into face. As you are pressing in I really noticed how the refreshing scent comes up for a few moments. Which is nice. It doesn’t last too long, so if you are sensitive to scent it fades quickly. My skin feels nice and I definitely would recommend this for normal to dry skin.  Its nice that a small amount goes a long way. I paired my with my favorite serum after to help add extra hydration. Overall it’s loaded with amazing ingredients and I have a pretty glow to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me through the Octoly program. Upon use I went to the La Mer page to see how to exactly use the product. Mary Phillips does a really good demo showing you how to warm the product between your hands to really break down the broth and warm the product up. As you press the product into your skin the refreshing scent really comes out. It’s really a nice cream. A small amount goes a long way which is nice. It’s really loaded with some amazing ingredients too. I would say this is best for normal skin. I’m more on the dry and still needed to add my hydrating oil to help my skin not feel too tight. But other than that I definitely see what the hype is all about. Over a few days your skin develops a really pretty glow too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product complimentary from La Mer for my review. First, I'm so glad I got this product! I followed directions exactly and warmed the product between my fingers before patting onto my face. I used this cream at night because of it's thickness. It has made a huge difference in my skins appearance! My face is no longer dry. My fine lines and wrinkles are significantly reduced as well. Even the dark spots I have on my face are fading. Now I know why the product hype is so big, it's really an amazing product! The only downfall with it was it smells like cold cream you can buy at Walmart. Still worked good and I definitely would recommend everyone try it! Thank you La Mer for this opportunity!

I received this product as a deluxe sample complimentary from La Mer. Honestly, it has to be the best moisturizer I have ever used. I've been using it in the mornings for a little over a week now, and it's really improving the appearance of my skin,  as well as the texture. My skin has become SO SOFT especially after sun exposure and tanning which always leaves my skin dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer complimentary from La Mer.  I've heard a lot about this brand and was excited to test Crème de la Mer Moisturizer for myself.  It's surprising and disappointing to see mineral oil as the second ingredient in this what is considered a super high end beauty brand.  My skin does feel deeply moisturized after applying.  Hydration lasts through the day.  I don't see any special results from the Miracle Broth that separates this product from other quality moisturizers. The product smells like flowers and cold cream.  Thankfully it's not heavily scented.  Due to the hype and considering the price point I guess I expected more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Creme de La Mer gifted by La Mer. I was a big fan of this brand because of their quality products. This is the first time I use their product and I am like Wow, it's great Creme de La Mer has a simple sophisticated packaging. I added this product to my morning skincare routine. I use it after the serum step. Absorb quickly and make my skin moisturized and hydrated and smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It gifted by Creme de La Mer from La Mer for my honest review. I have used it for a week and I really love it. First, the packaging is simple but sophisticated. The texture is thick but the cream by itself absorbs quickly dont leave any sticky feeling.  It helps my skin moisturized and hydrated after using. I use it right after my serum step in the morning and the evening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I receive this product gifted by La Mer. I really love La Mer this brand and this Cream is my favorite product! I have been using this Cream for years and it works very well for sensitive skin. Especially for redness on my cheek. I would highly recommend this product to everyone who has sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way! Super hydrating!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is worth every penny. I love how it feels on my skin and how it's amazingly moisturizing. I love the thickness of it and how it then melts in your fingers before applying. A little bit of product goes A LONG WAY. It glides on the skin like butter and really helps with making the skin more hydrated and firmer looking. It just wakes up your skin! I would highly recommend and I was gifted by La Mer but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me in exchange for an honest review. Before you apply the cream you have to warm it between your fingers. It has a light perfumy fragrance but it doesn't bother me. I prefer to use this in the day time because it is not enough hydration for me overnight. Overall this is a nice moisturizer but it does not justify the price. I think there are better formulas out there for less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most luxurious moisturizer that I’ve ever used. It is pricy, but a little goes a long way. I warm the cream between my finger tips before applying it. It’s thick but very smooth, with a very pleasant scent. Your skin will thank you. Gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my opinion.  This creme is the ultimate moisturizer for even the driest of skin.  Be sure to use a small amount and wam it up before applying.  I found that I liked using it at night and the soft creme in thw morning because this product took a little while to absorb. The results in 3 days are outstanding! My skin feels bouncy and looks refined and glowing! I'm extremely impressed in the change in my skin and its radiance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is very interesting how smooth and clean the face is after using the cream that was a “gifted  by  La Mer two times a day. I highly recommend it for daily use, preferably in the morning and at night. It reduces excess fat in the area of the face.  forehead and nose in my case I liked it a lot

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer. Ok I know this is super expensive and probably doesn’t have to be as expensive as it is. That said, it’s VERY good. Your skin will thank you. I don’t use it daily since I’m not rich but my skin adores it when it gets to have its special La Mer treat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My face is constantly dry. Finding a moisturizer that keeps in the moisture my skin needs is very hard to find. Then La Mer came and changed that for me. This moisturizer has quickly become my new favorite! It has a thick, smooth texture to it that feels incredible on my skin. I don't even have to use a lot when applying it. I just lightly put it on, rub it in, and my skin feels breathable and fresh. The scent is a lovely, soft scent. Almost floral that is really enjoyable too. I don't have to be self conscious if my skin looks flakey underneath my makeup anymore also. That was a major concern for me. My skin feels and looks so smooth and hydrated. I love it! Definitely recommend   *I received this product complimentary from La Mer. My opinions are my own*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Lamer these awesome products and I am so happy to receive it. This product was very moisturizing and smells fantastic. The product applies easily and doesn't leave any greasy residue. It made my skin look very smooth and vibrant. I will definitely recommend this item.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this Crème de la Mer complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest opinion. This is a rich and luxurious cream that applies effortless. A little goes a long way and it leaves my skin soft and moisturized. One thing to note is that you need to warm it up between your finger tips until translucent before applying it. I love how the glow in my skin every time I use it and I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve truly enjoyed the Crème de la Mer on my face, under-eyes and neck. It’s given great hydration both under makeup and as my night-time moisturizer. I am 35 with slight fine lines and normal skin. If you have oily or combo skin it might be a bit heavy for daytime. The texture is very thick and balmy - you are meant to just use a small bit and warm the creme in your hands before application. I prefer to press the creme into my skin in a patting motion. It gives a beautiful glow after application and has kept my skin hydrated throughout the day. The smell is faint and inoffensive. I have tried so many cremes and I do not have one in my collection that is quite like this! This product was gifted by La Mer, however I was free to review how I saw fit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Creme de la Mer Moisturizing Cream complimentary from LA Mer.  I have extremely dry skin, and La Mer has turned it all around for me.  I absolutely adore this moisturizing cream.  My skin is so soft, and the dryness is ebbing.  I love the sea-sourced infused renewing energies like seaweed extract & lime tea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this Crème de la Mer complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest opinion.   This is a thick luxurious cream, to apply get a small amount and work between your fingers to warm it and it becomes translucent.  Then pat into your skin.  It seems to take a little bit for it to absorb into my skin and looks a little oily to start but once it does absorb my skin feels so soft and very moisturized after applying and looks soft and dewy.  I tend to have extra dry patches and this has really help and keep them gone.  I It has a very soft delicate smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from la mer. I like the product for my dry skin. My skin stays moisturized and the cream doesn’t feel oily nor does it look too oily on my skin. It is expensive but a little goes a long way. Also have to remember to warm the cream between your fingers first before applying. Otherwise it doesn’t apply on as smoothly. It has a nice smell too. Just wished it was a little bit cheaper but will still use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by La Mer for testing purposes. I wasn’t really sure what to expect, so I began by watching the video showing how to apply the product. After warming the creme between my fingertips, I pressed it into my skin as directed… and WOW! I could feel the moisture immediately, and my skin loved it! A little goes a long way here, in both the initial application and the lasting power of the moisture. I applied the creme in the morning and at night after cleansing, and my skin felt moisturized and smooth. The effects seemed to multiply as the week went on, and in the end my skin felt healthier overall. I loved this product and 100% would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from La Mer and really love the texture and the feel on my skin. I have very dry and sensitive skin so a lot of products break me out but I’ve been using this about a week with no issues. It glides on really nicely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to receive the product Creme de la Mer complimentary from La Mer, in exchange for my honest review. I had recently watched a scientist review this very product from a scientific perspective. I was intrigued by the fact- based evidence, Creme de la Mer is  made of high quality ingredients it claims to be and performs the way it is intended to- not many brands can say that! That being said, I had high expectations of the creme, which were met! I love the consistency, it is quite thick and being so I initially though it would cause my face to feel greasy, but it did not. Creme de la Mer is unique as the product is meant to be warmed between your fingers, this causes it to become nearly translucent and also easier to apply. It glided across my skin, and despite the consistency, it didn't feel heavy.  After the first day of using it, both morning and night, my skin was very moisturized and had a nice glow. After a few more days of use  my skin tone looked more even, and  was better hydrated and plump. I would definitely recommend Creme de la Mer to anyone wanting to purchase it. While it may be pricey, a little goes a long way and because it is contained in porcelain the ingredients don't lose their potency over time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from La Mer. I really liked this moisturizer. I have oily skin and I don't feel my skin sticky and it is very quick to absorb. I have sensitive skin too and the power of hydration this moisturizer helps me a lot.

reviews.review_title: Works good yet not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer gifted me this product for my honest review. I have a combination skin. I am impress of how it’s so moisturizing , my skin feels so soft yet it’s to oily or greasy for my skin,after applying. And the scent not my fav.  And it’s too pricey.  Overall it works great in moisturizing yet not too great for me. A worth to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from La Mer. The cream smells pretty bad like intense floral baby powder. It does not go away for a couple hours. It almost triggers a migraine. A little goes a long way, but that makes sense, considering the second, third, and fourth ingredients are petroleum based and then wax. It does have nice occlusive properties and feels moisturizing, but for the price, cheap filler ingredients, and highly fragranced nature of the product, I would not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer a small sample in exchange for my honest review. The hype is real! I’m obsessed with this product. It is so moisturizing and a little product goes such a long way. Make sure you warm it between your fingertips before applying !Definitely saving my coins to buy a full size :).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the crème de la crème of skincare.  I was ecstatic my complimentary from La Mer - Soft Moisturizing Cream finally arrived. The formula is lightweight on the skin. I made sure to warm before applying like instructed and my skin absorbed it so quick! And just a small amount goes such a long way. My skin is left soft and velvety.  Since using, I definitely can tell my skin has become more hydrated and plumped. This is the definition of luxury skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer was gifted by La Mer , it is just amazing, when your first applied it you can feel the difference, your skin starts glowing and feels very smooth and soft. Love this. I wanted to try this brand for a long time and i got the chance and it is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate to be the Debbie downer here but I'm not sure what the hype is with this cream.  I've been using it for about a week now and don't feel that it's any different than a more affordable high end moisturizer - adding the fact that it doesn't even have an SPF.  It has a nice light scent and is rich and thick but this is a negative for me because it doesn't smooth easily over my skin and even feels like it pulls a bit so I found myself tapping it on instead.  It didn't melt into your skin (as I've experienced with other creams) and seems to instead sit on my skin until it absorbs after a few seconds.  I'm not overly impressed and don't see what about this cream can justify the outrageous price. *I received this product complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample complimentary from La Mer.  This is my first time trying Crème de la Mer Moisturizer.  I watched their instructional video that says to Warm it for a few seconds between the fingers until it becomes translucent . . .  I did this.  My issue with this process is that it takes more than a few seconds and then good amount of the moisturizer is absorbed into my fingers.  This is a huge waste, especially with this being a high end luxury product.  Once the moisturizer is warmed between your fingers you gently press it on to your face and neck.  You're not supposed to rub it in or anything.  It seems like a lot more product needs to be used this way.  I do not agree at all that a little goes a long way.  The product does hydrate very well.  My skin feels soft after using Crème de la Mer Moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a luxurious cream!! My skin felt softer and more supple after use and I just feel so bougie using it. Lol. I love how gentle it is on my skin, how it spreads smoothly and absorbs well. Love it!! Gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer gifted me this product for my honest review. Obviously this product is very expensive but it’s a great moisturizer if you have the $ to spurge. I love the container and how a little bit goes a long way. This moisturizer makes the perfect base under makeup and also pairs well with other products - I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so happy to try this cream gifted by La Mer. Ive heard so many great things and my experience echoed them! This cream needs to be warmed up by rubbing in gently between finger tips until you get a clear texture. Once you apply to skin its not sticky. You do not need a lot for it to work wonders. A little goes a long way. I love it because it treats my dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from La Mer. This is a very rich and hydrating cream and it’s highly fragranced, so if you’re not into that in your skincare then I definitely don’t recommend this. I didn’t mind the smell, it has a powdery floral scent. I enjoyed using this cream, it’s very luxurious and it wasn’t irritating. This cream is definitely hydrating. Although I didn’t notice any drastic change in my skin so I don’t think I could justify the price point for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was complimentary gifted by La Mer in exchange of my honest review. I like this creme overall. Gives your skins a different kind if hydration. Itll last you a very long time as well, because you are not using a lot of it. A little is what you'd need. I also wanted to mention how you'd have to take some & rub it on your fingers to warm it up until it's translucent, to apply. It's more effective like that. The only thing I don't like is the smell of it. Everything else is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received this  gifted by La Mer and I can say that this cream really gives your skin the benefit of looking years younger if used regularly. I wouldn't considering anything else!  I apply it in the evenings before going to bed and then in the morning when I wake up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is really soft and supple, and melts very into the skin. Feels nourishing. I do really like the use, and the aesthetic of the brand of course. It is one of those procedure brands that celebrities really ride hard for, and you can see why. Are there life altering ingredients in the formula? I’m not so sure. Does it feel amazing to use? Heck yeah. Great experience.  The product was gifted by La Mer in exchange for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After five days of applying La Mer face cream my skin feels more soft and hydrated, I notice let’s wrinkles around my eyes and the scent is fresh not overpowering and doesn’t leave any grease sensation on my skin, I would definitely will buy it again in the future,gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Highly effective but wish it absorbed quicker! I received the product complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest review. I was never drawn to La Mer because I’ve always had oily skin. Any moisturizer that’s super hydrating just did not have an appeal to me but I know this product is high end so I’m glad I finally got to try it for free. The verdict? This product definitely does work it’s magic. My skin felt smooth and very hydrated after usage; however it takes about 15 minutes for the product to be fully absorbed into my skin. I love the result but I hate greasy feels on my face. This is not my favorite product but if you’re looking for a very hydrating skin regimen, I highly recommend this product. Remember, a little goes a long way so use little at a time!

reviews.review_title: Decent cream. Certainly not worth full price.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This créme has quite the hype! I don’t know if I buy into the whole hype, but it is a nice face cream! I received a sample of this product complimentary from La Mer, but all opinions are my own.   First of all, they’re not lying when they say a little goes a long way. It truly does! Even for my dry skin! I prefer to use this as a nighttime cream, as it stays a bit too greasy for my liking during the day. The “ritual” of applying the creme is a bit cheesy for me, but I get the sentiment.   I have to complain about the scent. It smells like a product you would find on your grandmother’s vanity...not it a good way. It smells like baby powder/old lady, which I feel like is so unnecessary.   Scent aside, I think this is a nice creme, but I don’t think it’s anywhere near worth the ungodly amount of money they charge for this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been fortunated enough that La Mer gifted me their Crème de la Mer. Having a sensitive skin that means you are prone to skin break out, dryness and redness. Whenever weather changing, your skin always reacted too. I tried  Crème de la Mer for a few days already, and I love how it helped with my sensitive skin problem. This cream has a very thick creamy texture, but once you warm it up with your fingers it melts. Once the cream became translucent just press it gently to your face and neck, it does feel a little bit sticky when you applied it after few minutes it went away (I have a dry skin so it absorbed really fast on my skin). It has a pleasant floral scents to it, and it doesn’t bother me nor my skin. My skin definitely looks more plump and healthier, with all the dryness and redness gone. Definitely recommended with people with dry skin! Oh, and I also love that this Crème de la Mer came in a pretty little green pouch. The design is simple but always has that luxurious presentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very luxurious moisturizer that was gifted by La Mer for review. Also it is very pricey, a little goes a long way. I followers the directions a rubbed a small amount between my fingertips until translucent and then applied to my skin. I definitely noticed the hydration and it left a soft and smooth finish to my skin. My only complaint is that it is heavily fragranced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wa gifted by La Mer's Creme de la Mer in exchange for my opinion. This rich creams purpose is to provide deep, soothing moisture helping to heal dryness.  Your skin feels soft and supple and your lines and wrinkles will be visibly reduced. You apply twice per day by using a pea-sized amount, emulsified in your hands and geny patted onto your face and neck. After one weekof using I did notice my forehead wrinkles were visibly softened, my skin felt very soft and i really enjoyed the light scent. I would recommend and although the orice is steep, a tiny amount goes a long way. My opinion- worth it if you have the funds.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from La Mer.   I have really enjoyed Using La Mer at night. It has a really distinctive fragrance that can be a bit much during the day, but at night, it doesn’t bother me (because I’m sleeping.). I love the hydration and calmness it gives my skin. It always looks so refreshed in the mornings When I wake up. I do hope they will make it without the fragrance so I can use it both day and night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start this review by saying that I was extremely excited when I found out that I would be receiving the Creme de la Mer complimentary from La Mer! The packaging is a pretty green that is simple and to the point. Upon opening the jar I notice how nice the scent is.  I made sure my skin was clean and applied the product.  First I rubbed the creme between my fingers until it became translucent and then I pressed the product onto my face.  It did not take me long to understand why this product and it's miracle broth are considered legendary!  The moisture was noticeable from the start, and the hydration lasted all day!  I used this product for about a week and I have fallen in love with it. This rich, indulgent creme took care of my dry skin and my fine lines were reduced.  I also have a nice radiant glow. The icing on the cake is that a little goes a long way, and the product will last quite awhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this cream! No wonder it's so spendy, it's basically liquid gold! Well, it's not sparkly or gold-colored, but it is incredible. I learned that you need to warm the Creme with your fingertips until its translucent before applying. This is considered to be a clean skin product and doesn’t contain any of the known bad ingredients. My skin soaked this all up and it instantly showed.  This was gifted by La Mer. I plan on keeping it in stock and using it on the spots that need the extra help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite facial moisturizer. It is creamy and rich but lightweight and doesn’t feel too heavy on the face. It has a slight scent but not overly strong. A little goes a long way. Recommend.  Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Believe the hype, this creme by La Mer is a luxurious and rich cream that will hydrate and plump your dehydrated skin. Your skin will feel so moisturized without a heavy feeling or greasy. I recommend if you have combination skin like mine, apply by dabbing in your dryer areas first and the rest on the rest of your face and neck.  A little goes a long way, I used the recommend pea size and warmed it up first until it becomes clear, then you press it on your face and neck. If you feel is too heavy for you during the day use it at night and you’ll wake up to a softer, hydrated and plump looking skin! I noticed the redness faded away within the first week using it! My dry areas appreciated the amazing benefits of this creme, I’m in Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a complimentary from La Mer but I am providing my honest opinion. The cream (7ml each) arrived in a beautiful green velvet drawstring bag.  This is definitely worth the price of the bottle and a tiny dollop goes a long way.  I use the smallest amount and warm it up with the warmth of my fingers before pressing it on my face.     This is by far the most luxurious moisturizer I've ever used. The texture is rich and creamy and it leaves my skin soft all day with a luminous glow to it. One of my favorite things about this brand is that it’s  “Miracle Broth” has some great and clean ingredients in it - which makes me very happy to know exactly what is going on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cream.  La Mer is my favorite for my dry skin.  I use it in the morning and at night, just a pea sized amount.  My skin is softer, fuller and it says moisturized.  It is easy to apply, lightly scented and effective.  Wish it was more affordable but hey, it’s good stuff!  I was gifted this cream complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this cream! No wonder it's so spendy, it's basically liquid gold! Well, it's not sparkly or gold-colored, but it is incredible. A little bit goes on for miles, and this will last me quite a while. It's soo hydrating and smooth. It melts into my skin like butter on warm toast. I've never had anything like it, and I'm so excited to be able to use it and my wallet will probably cry when I re-purchase - but my skin will be so happy! I received this complimentary from La Mer, but that doesn't change my opinion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer. This cream feels so luxurious on my skin. It truly gives me hydration all day. It does have a scent, which I like but may not be for everyone. I found the scent is actually long lasting. Giving 4 stars as my skin is a bit reactive to fragrance and I think it caused a slight irritation. But overall a great cream if you aren’t sensitive to fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For over a week I have been using CREME DE LA MER and I absolutely love it. My face feels so much smoother. The moisturizer was a complimentary from La Mer. I totally recommend the moisturizer. Thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been wanting to try this brand for so long. And then I grabbed this and I am loving it so far! I followed how to best apply it and it went on nicely. Do not need to use a lot of product and for the cost, that’s a good thing! I was skeptical at first glance at the consistency but right after application my skin instantly looked luminous and had a nice boost. I’m noticing that my skin looks more vibrant and I’m looking forward to more long-term improvements to my usually dry skin. This truly helped with that instantly. I started out using this at night to make sure I had no adverse reactions and I had none. Now I use it sparingly in some spots on my face under makeup. This is considered to be a clean skin product and doesn’t contain any of the known bad ingredients. My skin soaked this all up and it instantly showed.  This was gifted by La Mer. I plan on keeping it in stock and using it on the spots that need the extra help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the La'mer moisturizing creme for my honest review. I did not like this creme. Its too thick and stayed sticky on the skin and did not soak into the skin. I followed the suggested directions with putting a small amount between fingers and warm it up till it becomes translucent, But it just didnt work out for me. This product was gifted by La'mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying anything from La Mer. I had heard so many wonderful things and the Creme De La Mer did not disappoint! I absolutely loved the formula and texture of the product. I could really feel it deeply moisturizing my skin and kept my skin hydrated all day. I loved that it wasn’t heavily fragranced. This is definitely one of the best moisturizers I’ve ever used. Would 100% recommend.  Complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_title: Make my skin soft and fresh.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It gifted by La Mer. When I first try this cream I love it. It’s very soft and hydrated . It smells very nice and give nice and fresh feel. I do feel my skin radiant and soft after us it. But price wise it’s bit expensive for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Crème de la Mer complimentary from La Met in exchange for my honest review. This cream has very thick consistency and little goes a long way. You have to melt it on your finger tips and apply on your face and neck. I have a combination skin and didn’t feel heavy on me but if you have oily skin, it maybe be too much for day time use. It moisturize the skin well but other than that I didn’t see anything special about this product. I personally don’t understand the hype...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think that the Creme de la Mer is a good moisturizer, that does help with aging and sensitivity of the skin. I deal with these issues and it did help to plump my skin, clear up a breakout and dry patches. These are the results that I received and not necessarily to be expected by everyone. The cream is very thick and you'll need to warm it up, in your hands, prior to applying. This item was gifted by La Mer in order to give my honest opinion about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from La Mer. I have been using this cream for a while and really amazed how it keep hydrated of my skin. Normally I only use small amount of product and gently rub it on fingers, allowing it warmed up and became translucent, then tap on my face. This cream is very effective in moisturizing and provides extensive protection from dry skin. It repairs my dry and peeling skin and lasts overnight, also makes my skin smooth and soft next day morning. This cream becomes my favorite face moisturizer now. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream was complimentary from La Mer to me in exchange for my honest opinion. This cream has a very nice feminine scent that is not overpowering. It is extremely thick, and it has to be warmed up with your fingertips until it's translucent before applying because it just won't spread easily if you don't. I have combination skin and it sat on my skin for the longest time. It is a heavily moisturizing cream, probably really great for dry to very dry skin types. It does leave your skin buttery soft but it was a bit too heavy for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizing cream is simply the  perfect cream! It is very lightweight, and quick to absorb. My skin feels so soft since I have started using it , and people are asking me if I did anything to my skin. Love the scent, it is very pleasant and gentle! The perfect moisturizing cream ! Gifted by La Mer. Will definitely be a returning customer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My face is loving this moisturizing cream. It’s texture is rich and creamy and it leaves my skin soft all day with a luminous glow to it. One of my favorite things about this brand is that it’s  “Miracle Broth” has some great ingredients in it. I also like that I only need to apply a little bit twice a day to feel the results I am looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One thing i like about this product most is it really calms my skin. I applied it every time my skin gets allergic/redness from other skincare. and it rescues my skin and keeps it hydrated. But the steps to apply it is a little bit complicated compared to most of other moistures.  I gave it four stats for its overpriced. It might be my problem not its though...So I am happy it's gifted by la mer this time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a complimentary from La Mer. Crème de la Mer 7ml.  got this complimentary product gift from la mer gift .I love how much of a difference it's made on my skin . Little fine lines dissapeared and my over dried t zone has improved soo very much . A little goes a long way . It smells good too .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer was gifted by the brand but all opinions are my own.  This is by far the most luxurious moisturizer I've ever used.  A tiny dollop goes a long way.  I use the smallest amount and warm it up with the warmth of my fingers before pressing it on my face.  It absorbs quickly and leaves my skin so smooth and hydrated.  I love to use this before applying my makeup  for a radiant healthy complexion.  It does an incredible job of smoothing out my lines and wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great if you have dry skin, I have combination with dry cheeks and this worked great. You have to warm the Crème between your finger tips until translucent before applying and its absorbs into the skin. Smell is a little strong, the texture is more suitable for dry weather. My skin felt smooth and soft after this. Gifted by La mer

reviews.review_title: My skin feels hydrated and happy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how lightweight and moisturizing this face cream is! It has a lovely scent too! I apply a little bit every morning and night after washing my face a d it makes my skin feel hydrated and happy! The size is great for travel and keeping in my bag which is nice because I never want to go without this stuff! “Gifted by La Mer”

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from La Mer in exchange for an honest review.  This cream has exceeded all of my expectations.  A little bit of the cream goes a long way so you don’t need much.  Gently rub the cream between your fingertips until it is translucent to warm it up and it goes on flawlessly.  An added bonus is the scent is pleasant but subtle so not overpowering.  I will definitely be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizing cream was gifted by La Mer. This cream feels so nice on my skin! It is a thicker moisturizer therefore a little goes a long way. I like to use it in the morning and just before bed. I have already noticed that my skin feels smoother and more moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was lucky enough to have received this complimentary from La Mer and I love it! I've never had a moisturizing creme like this and I'm impressed. A little bit goes a long way and I actually like that you have warm it up a little with a rub,I find it oddly cool. My horribly dry and sensitive skin doesn't get irritated with this and it's thoroughly moisturized with a tiny amount. If you suffer from dry skin, it may seem pricey but with the amount you have to use I still think this will last a good while!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have heard so many people I know go on & on about how amazing this cream is & well, I’m here to agree. I am in my mid-30s and have dry, flaky skin. I have been using this product day and night for a couple of weeks. My dry patches improved after just a few days. The magic comes from warming the cream between your fingertips (until translucent) before applying to the face. A little goes a long way- I start with a thin layer and build in areas that need that extra TLC :) My skin is really happy & glowing every morning. I don’t loooove the scent but I’m not offended by it. Do I think you need to spend this much to have healthy, plump skin? No. However, If your budget allows- this is a super luxurious experience. This product was provided complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest feedback.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been seeing this product from long time but never bought it because of the cost.Then I got is as a complimentary from La Mer. It is worth every penny. After a week use I can see even tone on my skin. Its more hydrated than before. I would definitely recommend it for dry and dull skin people like me.

I m very glad I received this complimentary from la mer for my honest opinion and review. This is the richest cream I have ever received and applies so smoothly and hydrates my skin so well. I now understand the hype around this product I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest review. his is such a great moisturizer; nothing I've ever used compares. You can buy either the solid, heavier cream for your face or the less dense formula that is lighter. I tend to prefer the heavier cream. I heard it was first used to treat burn victims; whether or not that's true it's a wonderful cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this sample set. Both lotions are so creamy and really rejuvenate the skin. Youthful, luminous and beautiful. It really does pay to invest in good skincare. The proof is in the pudding and La Mer really does deliver. Complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The La Mer moisturizing cream is amazing. The cream is soft and is not greasy. It has been good for my dry skin as well. Thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer this product in exchange for my honest review. I have been trying this product from 7 days and I can confidently say that I really like this product. It is a thicker cream but it does not make my skin feel stuffy or irritated. It go on my skin evenly and even sit great underneath makeup. However, if you have oily skin I would not recommend wearing this in the daytime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from La Mer. It is a wonderful moisturizer! Goes on smoothly and leaves the skin glowing. I had mild irritation after using some other products and this cream helped me right away. I like that you only need to apply a little at a time and that it will last a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted some Crème de la Mer complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest review. I fell in love with the packaging first (Mine arrived in a beautiful green velvet drawstring bag) but I soon fell just as in love with the actual product.  At first glance, it seems far too thick for a moisturizing cream, but if you take a very small amount(pea sized) and warm it between your fingertips until it is translucent, you will find it thins down beautifully and that tiny amount will be plenty for your entire face. I have been using this product for almost a week now, and I can already see a visible difference in my skin. It is plumper and more radiant. I love the way my skin feels!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer. I’m so excited I received this jar of cream! It has made my skin so soft and so smooth. I had gotten it recommended so many times and I finally got my hands in it. I definitely recommend it. I like to apply it when I wake up and when I go to sleep.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this creme complimentary of La Mer in exchange for my honest opinion. I absolutely love the clean, light, refreshing scent of this creme. I had to warm it up in between my fingertips until it became clear and a little bit definitely goes a long way. I do wish that it was a thicker consistency but that's only my preference. it did its job and moisturized my dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite go to moisturizer! Feels rich and creamy but doesn't feel heavy on my skin. Makes my skin look and feel so soft. I received this item complimentary from La Mer for my honest review and 10/10 recommend! I will be buying this from now on as part of my daily routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer. Wow wow wow loving this stuff so far! Like Botox in a jar. I typically try not to spend too much on skincare but I think I’ll be making an exception for this. I can’t get enough. Luckily a little goes a long way so hopefully these little samples last me a while!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I’ve used this one time so far and I promise I have noticed a difference in my fine lines! I’m not crazy lol I put some on one hand and not the other and I can tell a difference. I’m hoping with continued use it will reverse my wrinkles and fine lines. A little does go a long way thank goodness because woo the price. I love this stuff and I definitely recommend if you can afford!!
