reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted  by La Mer and I’m quite surprised that this product contains petrolatum, glycerin and synthetic fragrance with such an elevated price tag. I personally feel this moisturizer is to greasy and requires a larger amount than suggested to cover the face. It’s not very absorbent and I am not pleased with the scent. I really expected so much more from this product. I will continue to use in hopes to see results with fine lines but probably would not purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've always wanted to try this cream and let me tell you something, this cream is awesome! I just received it as complimentary from La Mer. Putting it on lightly in the morning and night, I noticed a difference in a couple of days. I am almost 40 and started to have lines, althought my lines haven't completely disappeared they've become less and aren't as noticeable due to the product leveling out my face. It also looks and feels firmerand smoother. It has a pleasant scent, is lightweight and feels wonderfully refreshing. Is definitely a must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to get to try this cream out I had heard a lot of good things about it.  It left my skin looking and feeling so hydrated without clogging my pores and causing breakouts. A little goes a long way and it smells so good.  It was gifted by La Mer for me to try out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from La Mer. This stuff is amazing! It’s definitely worth the hype. It makes my skin feel so moisturized and smooth. It has a nice subtle smell and the formula is moisturizing without making my skin feel greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from La Mer for my review, all opinions are my own. The moisturizing cream is awesome. A little goes a long way and you have to warm up the product on your fingertips then apply it. It is very moisturizing and feels amazing and does not make me oily. It has a nice light fragrance. I would recommend it but it is expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: gifted by la mer, first of all, the packaging and bag where it comes from is super cute, the smell is delicious, and when applied my skin feels so good, it feels fresh, soft and hydrated, this cream is definitely a luxury that there is what to give yourself

reviews.review_title: Creme de La Mer is amazing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Creme de La Mer complimentary from La Mer. I think this stuff is amazing! A little bit really does go a long way. Make sure to read the instructions to use it properly because at first I totally used it wrong. I was trying to apply it straight to my face from the jar but you're supposed to take some in between your fingers and warm it up until it turns clear. Then press it into your face. If you just scoop it out of the jar and try to rub it in then it wont work right. It doesn't smell great but it's also not horrible. It reminds me of a shampoo that was made years ago. I am warming up too the scent. After I use this my face feels so soft and amazing. I really didn't think I would like this and I was totally wrong about that. This has quickly become one of my go to products. My skin just feels more plumped and hydrated when I use it. I would definitely recommend and I would purchase it for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great moisturizer cream from La Mer. The texture is rich and creamy which is perfect for cold and dry winter. It’s not very greasy and absorbs quickly compares to other thick creams. And the hydrating effect is amazing, leave my skin a soft and smooth feel. I received this cream complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a promotional offer gifted by Le Mer, the cream is really thick and kind of hard to apply on the face to distribute it.  I have to stop using it because is not safe for pregnant woman’s.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer gifted me this Creme de La Mer in exchange for my honest review. This cream feels very luxurious to use and made my skin feel great. I was afraid that it would be too oily, but when applied correctly by warming in my fingertips, I did not have any issues. Coming out of the winter months my skin always feels dry and this cream certainly helped hydrate and smooth my problem areas.

reviews.review_title: Been wantiing to see what all the hype was about
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always wanted to see what the hype is with LaMer cream. LeMer was gifted to me to try for my honest review. I love the  cream. A little does go along way. I’ve been using the cream day and night and I can see the results in my skin. I can see it’s helping reduce my fine lines. I have dry skin and the cream helps the dry area but not making the rest of my face oily. Overall I love the cream my only issues is the price, but I’m sure that won’t change.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got super excited to try out the lamer cream complimentary from Lar Mer!  I absolutely love this product. A little goes a long way. It has a pleasant light fragrance,  it feels super hydrating and not heavy at all.  You have to warm it up between your fingers before applying, but it spreads beautifully.  It also works nicely with my other skincare.  Overall a nice product but the price is what let me down.

reviews.review_title: The most luxurious and moisturizing cream!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer the Creme De La Mer Moisturizing Cream. This moisturizing cream soothes and heals dry skin. It is made with LaMer’s Miracle Broth to infuse skin with sea sourced renewing energies that moisturize, repair, and strengthen your skin barrier for firmer, healthier, and more radiant skin. The trick is to warm it a bit between your fingers, and then gently pat onto your face. This cream makes my skin feel so soft, moisturized, and more firm. Since I am in my late 30’s, I am always looking for great anti-aging creams and serums. This cream is so rich without being too heavy, and extremely luxurious. It has great anti-aging skin benefits that help to smooth over and firm fine lines and wrinkles. My skin adores the La Mer Creme De La Mer, and my skin really looks healthy and radiant after using this. I love that a little bit of this goes a long way, and doesn’t leave my skin feeling sticky or greasy. It really absorbed fast, and left my skin perfectly moisturized and silky smooth. I definitely noticed a small difference after only using for a few days, and I instantly fell in love with this cream.

reviews.review_title: Good for my dry and dehydrated skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This deluxe sample from La Mer was gifted to me in exchange of my honest review. It's an expensive product let's start with that, so I'm really grateful for the opportunity to try this product. It smells good, for me was like a kinda herbal smell that stays with you for a while and then goes away. Instructions claim a little bit is enough and you need to warm it up between your fingers and apply it day and night. My skin is on the dryer side most of the time but my nose and chin always grease and my skin always feels dehydrated no matter what so I tried this product and my skin instantly look moisturized and with a kinda glowing effect and I loved the results even on the first application. I kept using the cream for several day and im planning on using till I finished the deluxe samples because I think is worth it. My face looks and feels different and I'm happy with this results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer is the definition of luxury skincare! The Creme De La Mer moisturizing cream is no exception. It has a light fragrance that smells amazing. The texture is smooth and the consistency is just right. It absorbs quickly and leaves my skin looking healthy and moisturized. It’s definitely in my top faves for skincare products! I received this product complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer has been a staple for me for years, the travel size is perfect as I travel often - especially for dry and colder climates! Since a little goes a long way, it’ll last several trips and best part is you can refill it and it’s such a cute mini size! I was gifted by la Mer, however have been buying the full size for years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from La Mer . It’s Rich and creamy texture it is more of a thick cream so it does feel a little heavier it has a nice smell , love that it is really rich and hydrates my dry skin all day does make my skin feel greasy after a long day .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer gifted me this samples to try. After a few days using them I can say they're good, they are moisturizing, don't leave the skin greasy looking, a small amount is all you need for the whole face. I emulsify the cream with my fingers and then pat it on my skin. Overall a nice product but the price is what let me down, I can get the same effect with a much cheaper moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: lovely moisturizer! the first time i tried it i thought i was too heavy for my combo skin, but i think i was using too much. with only a pea size, this feels super hydrating and not heavy at all. gifted by la mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: wanna try it for a long time and I was excited to got it as a complimentary from la mer. my skin is dry and sensitive, this creme is hydrated enough while not oily and not irritated. but for this price, I expect more magical effect. maybe two week is not long enough to see the effect.

I received this product complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest opinion.  I absolutely love this product. A little goes a long way. My skin has improved greatly since using this product. It doesn't make me feel greasy or sticky. I will continue to use this product and would definitely recommend it to my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer gifted me their Moisturizing Soft Cream for my honest review.  This was my first experience with this brand, very impressed. It's a lightweight cream, but ultra hydrating on my dry skin. Just a little bit morning and night goes a long way to heal dryness and strengthen the skin's barrier.  It has a pleasant light fragrance, and after just a few weeks I've noticed my complexion is more radiant and youthful, with fine lines and wrinkles less noticeable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed trying this cream. It has a nice floral scent that I didn’t find overwhelming. The cream was super rich and smooth, and blended smoothly into my skin. It left my skin moisturized and super smooth. I enjoyed using these samples and would gladly use this again. The only downside if this product to me is the cost - it’s a bit more than I usually spend on skincare.  Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift from la mer. My first impression was based off of the ingredients and the scent, but after using I feel like it is a great product for dry skin and fine lines. I was happy with the way it felt and hope it helps with my wrinkles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from La Mer. This cream is so rich and luxurious! It melts into my skin and smells like a garden! Is the price crazy, yes, but am I low key addicted to it? Also a yes! Haha. For someone who really needs that extra moisture and also doesn’t mind fragrance, this is a keeper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to be gifted by La Mer. A little definitely goes a long way with this cream. I have normal to dry skin that leans more dry in the winter and more normal/combo in the summer. This is a beautiful cream. You have to warm it up between your fingers before applying, but it spreads beautifully. It leaves my skin glowing and I love to use this cream before makeup and it’s also lovely as a night cream. It is pricey, but if you can afford it (I would recommend buying it during a sale) I think it’s worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by LA MER to try out a sample of there LA MER MOISTURIZING CREAM to give my honest opinion. I really like the not so fancy packing. I feel like if something works then let the product speak for itself. I love the smell. Its not to strong or too much. It smells light and fresh. The moisturizer is a little thick. So a little goes a long way. If you use to much it gets a little greasy. It does soak into the skin very well as long as you don't over do it. I use as a night time mask for a boost of moisture when my skin is really dry. All in all i think its a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely Amazing! A tiny bit of this truly does go a long way. It absorbs extremely fast into my skin and leaves it feeling so soft and glowing. I am so excited to continue using this product everyday and achieve beautiful long lasting results.  Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited when I was gifted this cream by LaMer. A little goes a long way. I have dry skin in the winter and combo skin in the spring/summer. This has worked nicely in both cold and hot weather (since lately it can’t make up its mind). I’m glad i read the directions because warming the product up really helps with the application. I love how hydrating this has been without feeling thick and sticky. It also works nicely with my other skincare. For me, it’s more of a nighttime cream but it still works under makeup beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer. I want to note that you really need to follow the instructions to get the best out of this product. They note a little goes a long way which is very true! It is expensive but since you do not need much it will last a long time. Also, make sure to warm up the product between your fingers to make sure it is at its prime consistency when you apply. I hate when products leave my skin oily after applying but this absorbs in so nicely.  I love the glow it gives me for no makeup days. I have dry skin and this definitely provides enough daily moisture. Worth the splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a thick creme and I have oily skin so I was concerned it would be too moisturizing. A little really does go a long way and I enjoy patting it into my skin during my morning and night routine. The smell is a little strong but I don’t mind scents in skincare. It sinks into the skin quickly and leaves it feeling moisturized but not overly so. You have to rub between your fingers until it becomes translucent prior to application. I received a sample complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from La Mer in exchange for an honest review. I absolutely love the cream, though I admit I was skeptical at first because of the price, and the fact that people say that it's thick and hard to spread. There's a right way to do it! You need to take a little bit and warm it up first, by tapping your fingers together. It gets buttery smooth and much easier to apply. I found that I actually enjoyed it. It made my skin really soft. Price is an issue, but I figure, I'd rather spend $200 on a jar of cream that lasts me a year, than a beauty box subscription that comes with stuff that I'll never use and that just clutters up my bathroom, and does nothing for my skin. I'm a convert. I'm buying this when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is so luxurious and rich! I’ve never tried any products from LaMer and I see why it’s a favorite! The packaging is so fancy, from the velvet bag to the soft texture of this moisturizer. If you can, I would at least try the travel size. I’ve used this several days in a row and my skin looks so good! *This product was gifted by La Mer*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lovely cream complimentary from La Mer in exchange for an honest review. The classic moisturizer used by generations of discerning skincare enthusiasts truly is evergreen. Cremè de la Mer's OG moisturizer is still one of the best moisturizers for dry skin. It helped me heal my moisture barrier after a particularly terrible spell of TEWL. This is one of the few premium products that I will gladly pay more for, as it is worth every penny. A tiny bit goes a long way. I take half a dime sized amount and warm it between my fingertips. This actually changes its consistency from a thick cream to a thinner, easier to spread cream. Just dot it all over your face, gently massage in, and you're good to go. I love the fragrance (never bothered me). It's a fantastic purchase, well worth it, especially if you buy it during a sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I Love how La Mer cream leaves my skin super hydrated and glowing. It's a thick cream but doesn't leave the skin looking greasy. I do recommend watching How-to video before applying. Overall texture of my skin has improved tremendously. I enjoyed the smell alot, it also didn't break me out or cause sensitivities. I recived this product complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by La Mer and is one of the best moisturizers I have used.  A little goes a long way!  Don't forget to warm up the cream by rubbing between your finger tips until translucent before applying.  It made my face feel so smooth and I noticed hydration instantly.  I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as complimentary from La mer.I have combination skin, ceme de la mer though it looks like a thick cream wasn’t at all greasy. It absorbs so well and made my skin hydrated and smoooth. Feels luxurious! Though it is pricey, little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There’s a reason why this cream is sought after. I’ve tried this cream from samples and now I am hooked.  The texture is rich but lightweight  on my skin. If I have to indulge or treat my self with high end skincare, I definitely will buy the ounce of this cream.  Complimentary from La mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer was gifted by La Mer in exchange of my honest review. I rub it a little in my hand before applying this moisturizer. A little is enough for the entire face. I feel my skin has become softer. It has not caused any sensitivity to my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so in love with this cream! it is super thick and a little bit goes a long way.  This lasts forever.  I used this during my PM routine and i wake up with super smooth and soft skin.  I warmed the product between my fingers and pat on my skin.  It feels so luxurious and my skin just soaks it all up.  It doesn't leave a sticky residue.  The smell is light and pleasant.  Gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got dry skin? Looking to invest in better quality skincare? THIS IS THE PRODUCT FOR YOU! La mer gifted me this face cream and I completely understand the hype now. This luxury product is high end in price for a reason. This face lotion makes my skin feel like I’ve been gulping a gallon of water a day. I slather it on all the way from my hairline to my décolletage and feel incredible all day. There is nothing like this out there and it does work great under makeup too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love La Mer! The size is generous for the price. You don’t need a lot; just a few dabs after the shower. I love using this after I do an exfoliating scrub & a mask to seal in moisture. The little green pouch it comes in is so nice & great quality. I was given this product to try complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This creme is true luxury for your dry skin! You do have to warm it until translucent before apply, but a little goes a long way. My skin gets dry and red, especially in my cheeks and this has helped calm it dramatically. It’s not too heavy for my t-zone either and immediately reduces the appearance of the lines in my forehead. It was complimentary from La Mer and I will definitely be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Creme De La Mer for a while now. And I love how my skin is super hydrated & healthy since I started.  This is a very high quality moisturizing cream. A little bit goes a long ways & it just melts into my skin. I was gifted by LA MER

The way your skin feels after moisturizing at night and waking up in the morning is phenominal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer. I really love this Moisturizing Cream! It leaves my face looking moist but not greasy.  I have not had any breakouts while using this! I feel so luxurious after using this cream!

reviews.review_title: AMAZING! The best hydration for facial skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Creme De La Mer, which I received a sample of, gifted by La Mer.  This Creme De La Mer is amazing and holds the secret to well hydrated, supple and healthy skin that glows! This cream is ultra moisturizing with its skin loving ingredients, such as natural sea kelp, and relieves dryness after the first use. A little bit definitely goes a long way with this Creme De La Mer, simply make sure to follow usage instructions and warm up the cream between your finger tips, you will know when it is ready to apply when it turns from white and thick to a smooth and translucent texture and color. Once applied to the skin I love how it makes my skin instantly appear dewy and more even looking. Even though this is a thicker consistency, which you will feel upon applying it, it will only stay that way for about ten to twenty minutes, and then it will have completely absorbed into the skin and there’s no greasy or heavy residue left behind. This luxurious cream hydrated my dry facial and neck skin back to healthy, I love it! You should definitely give it a try, excellent quality and worth it! I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This came in cute little containers which I loved. It was a complimentary from La Mer. But it was thick and creamy just like we was supposed to. I had a couple dry spots that needed something desperately and this did the trick. The thickness made it harder on sensitive skin areas to live around but once it was it absorbed in really well and did the trick. Amazing stuff! Just need a way to get that little bit out of the bottom.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer in exchange for my honest opinion. I’m absolutely in love with this moisturizing cream. The scent isn’t overwhelming in the least but rather pretty light and the cream itself is very hydrating. It has a thick consistency and my skin felt so much softer just after the first use. I will admit the price point is a little high but you definitely get your money’s worth when it comes to quality for this product. I’m very open to continue purchasing in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Creme de la Mer complimentary from La Mer. The cream itself is thicker than other creams I have tried before. I did have to use a little cream on my face for it to not be greasy. I did feel like the cream is a bit heavy on my skin and clogs my skin. I tried a method of using the cream to warm up on my fingertips then softly pressing on my skin. I got more of the cream into my fingertips than on my face. I tried gently rubbing the cream into the skin and feels like it is tugging my skin. I don't think this cream is good for my type of skin which is dry and acne-prone because it just doesn't absorb well. This might work with some other types of skin but just didn't do much for mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Crème de la Mer complimentary from La Mer and I am very happy with the product because my skin feels super hydrated and moisturized. The cream is soft and light. It does not leave my skin oily but with a barrier for protection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The feel of this product is so luxurious.  It feels rich and extremely moisturizing. Not a strong scent but i prefer that when it comes to skin care products. The instructions tell you to take a little and warm it in your hands which helps it kinda melt before application. This alone makes it feel like high end products.  I am in love with the product and hurting on the price as it is very expensive.  I did receive this complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with it!)I have used the LA MER mositurising soft cream for about a week now and since the first use have noticed my skin is less dry and fine lines noticbly reduced. The Crème de la Mer   gifted by La Mer) Thanks for this)))

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been lucky enough to have have gotten my hands on this creme complimentary from la mer moisturizing cream to give my honest opinion on. As a skincare junkie I've always wanted to get my hands on this luxurious expensive cream to see what's all the hype is about! It's known to be a big deal in the skincare community very much a holy grail for so many.  Their moisturizer does what it claims to do, it truly leaves your skin feeling so soft the formula includes their miracle broth that is sourced from the ocean along with lime tea concentrate and giant sea kelp. Together these ingredients strengthen the skin barrier while protecting it from environmental stress and supports it's healing process but I am here to provide you my honest thoughts and yes while this cream does feel SO luxurious and keeps my skin feeling soft and hydrated, it’s by no means a take my money type of product. I've come across plenty of moisturizers and find others to be similar for just a fraction of the cost of this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A really nice and moisturizing cream for dryer skin which sat nicely on my face. Make sure to warm it in your fingers before you apply because it is a thick consistency so this is completely different from other moisturizers I have tried. It has a strong fragrance that doesn't seem to last on my face but mostly in the jar. It made my skin really hydrated and it was a great base for foundation. I received this complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by La Mer. I have found the perfect moisturizer for my skin, La Mer makes my skin feel so luxuriously smooth and soft. I have been experiencing rough patches in various areas on my face, and this super rich moisturizer went to work quick on my dry rough skin and in just a day or two my skin was soft, supple, gorgeous and glowing. I can’t recommend this wonderful moisturizer enough, it’s truly amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is 100% worth the price. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated and smooth. The scent is unlike any cream I've ever used and the cream doesn't leave a sticky feeling like other creams do. Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from La Mer. This moisturizing cream is thick, I was kind of worried that it will make my skin feel a little bit greasy but actually it absorbs into my skin quickly. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face cream has made my skin feel so soft with a beautiful, healthy glow! I love the texture of the cream, which applies evenly and easily to my skin. The cream provides long lasting moisture to my skin and keeps it soft all day. I really love this moisturizer! I received this product complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by La Mer. This is an incredibly lightweight moisturizer where a little goes a long way. I warm it up between my fingertips until it turns translucent before applying. It helps fill in fines lines and makeup sits beautifully on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. It hydrated my skin like no other moisturizer. It does have a fragrance so if you are sensitive to scents this may not be for you. You only need a little bit for your whole face. Do not go overboard with this product. This products melts right into your skin.  It leaves your skin dewy and hydrated for at least 24 hours.  This gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve heard a lot of great things about the brand @Lamer. But I haven’t tried any product from them. Luckily, LaMerGiftedme their moisturizing cream, and I am so pleased. I have sensitive and dry skin; that is why I’m always on the hunt for a great moisturizer to compliment my skin condition. After using La Mer for a few days, I instantly notice an improvement. I will continue to use it for more significant results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from lamer.my wife loves it I tried it too it’s very moisturizing. I follow as the interactions says to warm up in finger other wise it’s feels greasy..smells is great,and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from La Mer. This cream is very moisturizing. Little goes a long way. I apply it at night and wake up with a nice glow. The cream gets absorbed really quickly. Wish it is more affordable.

This cream applies to your skin like a creamy butter. Warm up with your fingers then lightly pat onto your skin for immediate hydration and a beautiful glow. reviews.review_text: Super amazing and nice moisturizing cream. Love the rich creamy texture and a little goes a long way. I have received Crème de la Mer moisturizing cream complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my review.

I warm the cream between my finger tips as instructed before applying. It gives me an amazing glow which I love and enjoy. Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer, the Moisturizing Cream for review purposes.  I’ve tried a decent number of rich creams but this one is the most unique in terms of texture. It’s a rich, creamy balm that has to be warmed up before applied on the face. I do feel like the cream can drag on my skin, even after warming it up and spritzing my face prior. I do really really love the look it gives. A blurred, dewy canvas that works well under makeup and to sleep. I’m more impressed by it than I expected. Because of the price, I don’t see myself using this everyday. But I would definitely use it for events, and nightly use. I see myself buying this, when there is a sale. I don’t need a lot so I think it could last me a bit . I do feel like this is a luxury item, so not necessary, but it is special. And I would splurge on it!  This could easily be five stars, once I see if there are long term effects from using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So thankful to receive this, gifted by La Mer. Créme de la Mer is a game changer. Only a pea sized amount is needed, rubbed between fingers for a moment until it’s ready to melt into skin. I noticed brighter, beautifully hydrated skin immediately upon application. The scent is very mild and pleasant. This moisturizing creme is a god send. If you have dry skin, you need this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long with with this creme. Gifted by La Mer, I tried this product for a week and noticed my skin felt much more moisturized. Dry patches were gone and skin felt smoother. Make sure to warm up the product between your fingers before applying.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

What I loved most about it is my face felt really hydrated after using it. I also like the scent but if you aren’t into scented products this may not be for you. Also it’s a thick cream so a little bit goes a long way.  It absorbed easily into my skin and really made a noticeable difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received for free my Créme de la Mer. Gifted by La mer for give my review.Its good because is thick and you need just a little for all your face. I dont like too much the scent but i can tolerate its not than bad. I loved the package the green bag is so pretty its my fav color. The skin absorbs quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had really high expectations for this product because of the price and reviews and it was a total fail for me. The texture is not friendly. I had a very hard time applying it to my face. It takes a quite a while to become translucent. I tried the pat in method which didn’t feel like any product was getting on my face and then I tried rubbing it in even though the instructions tell you not to and that didn’t work because of the texture. It’s really difficult to use. It will eventually after some time become spreadable but it’s not worth the time. It leaves a nice sheen when it does spread. If they could fix the timing portion i would totally be all about it because the sheen/glow is really nice. The scent is okay. It’s not great but also not off putting. I will not purchase this product in the current form. I received the product complimentary from La Mer for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Creme de la Mer as well as other La Mer products and I have to say they are amazing!! I have tried so many other moisturizers over the years and find that they either can't moisturize enough, caused breakouts or both. This is great to give extra in the summer and less in the winter - it really is dual seasons.The scent is light and fresh. All you need is a little bit and it goes a long way. I received this product complimentary from La Mer for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by LaMer in exchange for  my honest opinion...so I waited to do this review in the event that my skin reacted but after a week all I could say is wow this product is powerful...my dull dry skin looks so much more healthier and shinier. I absolutely love the texture of my skin and how much moisture it has drawn back to my face. I highly recommend this product especially now that the summer is. Around the corner it will hydrate your skin and keep it looking young

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this face cream complimentary from la mer to review and I am so glad I tried it. It has a nice fresh scent that I like. It’s important to warm the cream between your fingers before dabbing onto your face because a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: (Gifted by la mer) La mer feels silky and smooth. The soft fragrance is very enticing, but not overpowering. It is easily applied and it does not leave residues.  It leaves the skin feeling fresh and renewed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Crème de la Mer 7ml from La Mer is a very thick emollient creme. Use a pea sized amount, rub between fingertips, and pat into skin. It has a very strong, almost floral scent. Very hydrating and absorbs into the skin rather quickly. The glow is unreal, it’s beautiful! However, the scent is bothersome to my eyes and it makes my skin unbearably itchy, I really wish that it didn’t because I love how my skin looks and feels after using it.   Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream was complimentary from La Mer. I recently received and been using this cream. Honestly, this has to be my favorite cream as of now. This leave my face so smooth and nice. I love how it moisturizing it is and it leaves my face feeling so fresh.  My skin is dry to combination and my skin looks amazing! Overall, this is an amazing cream which I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the La Mer Creme de la Mer moisturizing cream to test out and review.  This is an amazing moisturizer,  so hydrating,  so nourishing.  I've been using this out for about 2 weeks now and have really been loving what it's doing for my dry skin. I take a small amount and warm up on my finger tips and pat into the skin. The saying a little goes a long way really applies to this thick luscious cream! It does have a fragrance to it but I don't mind it all and it's very subtle and hadnt caused any irritation at all! I really have enjoyed adding this to my routine its thick enough for my dry skin but doesnt feel heavy all , nor greasy! Thank you so much La Mer for letting me try this amazing moisturizer! Gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Le Mer. I have been wanting to try this for so long but if you could see my bin of products that did not work you would understand my hesitancy in getting this. Worth it's weight in gold is the first thing that comes to mind. First, I love the velvet bag it comes in. Its screams high end from the get go. Now on to the product itself. Although you might think the price is high I can testify a little really goes a long way which is savings in the end especially if it genuinely works. My skin is combination but as I've aged I deffinatly have more wrinkles, sags and bags. All the fun stuff that comes with age. Once you emulsify a very small amount between your fingers and smooth it on I noticed it was like a velvet canvas on my face. It dident leave a oily residue type feeling. I put this on before my makeup and it just made for a very even and smooth surface  to work with. It dident make things look caked either. Im so glad I has a chance to try this out, I'm sold. If your like me with the huge bin of no go's I hope this helps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer.  Light in texture, and very hydrating! A little goes a long way to cover and blend on my face. I normally have dry skin, and this cream felt wonderful once warmed and applied. Even though this product contains perfume, it didn't irritate my sensitive skin! The only downside of this product is the price, I wish it was more accessible as I would love to repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to finally try this cream when it was gifted to me complimentary from La Mer. I struggle with fine lines and some dry patches and had heard wonderful things about it and read several reviews prior to trying. Thankfully, watching a how to video and the reviews prepared me for how thick this cream is. reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this moisturizer, but I'm not sure it's for me. Even though I read the directions and watched the video, I struggled to use it in a seamless way. First, no matter how much I warmed this product in my hand, it still felt tacky. Second, warming it in my hands per directions made me feel I was wasting expensive product. Third, I honestly didn't enjoy the experience of patting it into my face. I felt like I was missing places, and that I couldn't get good coverage. When I tried smoothing it onto my face, it was just too tacky. I don't know if I got a bad batch or I have more sensitivity to texture than I thought, but the experience of using this moisturizer wasn't pleasant. It does seem to do its job, I just missed putting on moisturizer like usual and it was so tempting to go back to my old one that was easy to apply, I'm having trouble finishing it. It was enough of a hassle that I would not buy this product but I gave it 3 stars because I think it does moisturize. This was gifted by La Mer.

Well ladies and gents, this just changed the game! I’ve been using this at night and can see a MAJOR difference in the hydration of my skin. My face no longer feels super tight & I mean at all! My skin feels like actual skin again, no more dreaded reptile texture face for me. When I run out of the samples gifted by La Mer, I will definitely purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Crème de la Mer complimentary from La Mer. I absolutely love the Crème de la Mer. This ultra moisturizing creme gives a beautiful, fresh glow to your facial areas and you can instantly feel the hydration that lasts all day.  When I can feel the hydration and softeness and see the results I know I have a golden product. A little bit of this creme goes a long way and it's very simple to apply. There's even a helpful tutorial on how to correctly prep the product for use and for applying in a simple pressing motion.  I use this day and night and my face and neck area has never felt and looked better. It does have a high price tag but I will say that this is worth it if you're serious about skincare. I've recommended this product to my friends and family and I'd recommend it to anyone I don't personally know as well!

Not until I tried this one. I definitely need moisture big time, because I use pure retinol. My skins so sensitive to it, It never got use to it No matter what tips the professionals recommend. I'm not sure what drug store sells a moisturizer for a dollar that remotely holds a candle to this, because I've seen them all. I give them all a big fat F. This melts into my skin, it doesn't ball up and fall off. it's like silk. It's beautiful and my skin is so soft and balanced out. I absolutely love it. I'm so happy Sephora put it in their favorites. or there's a big chance I may have not checked it out. So thanks Sephora keep dropping in those awesome box favs. FYI ladies, it's so worth it. start with the .05 size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: My skin is softer, hydrated, and healthier.

reviews.review_text: “Crime de La Mer”is a thick luxurious face cream with a light fragrance. I warm a pea sized amount for a few seconds on my finger tips- a little goes a long way. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is a amazing. A little goes a long way. You just warm it up between your fingers and smooth it on. It’s a amazing. I know it’s pricey but it’s well worth it. I will definitely keep purchasing. Gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream was gifted by La Mer. This cream has the most luxurious and rich texture. It has a thick texture but but it has an almost whipped texture that just melts into the skin. I have very dry skin so, I’m always looking for a rich and nourishing face cream to slather on day and night. This moisturizer really coats the skin in a soothing and cushiony veil. It feels instantly soothing and hydrating. Over time, it definitely locks in moisturizer and hydrated the skin. I love using this in the Eve is because it can feel like a overnight mask! It really hydrates, plumps, and smooths the texture of the skin. You can still use it during the day to prep your skin for makeup, I just wouldn’t apply too much. Makeup glides on the skin very seamlessly and applies very evenly with this moisturizer underneath. While it is pricey, I find I never need much to really hydrated and nourish my skin. I highly recommend this cream! It really is as luxurious as everyone says it is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the La Mer moisturizing cream complimentary from La Mer. I found it to be an excellent source of moisture. My skin looked and felt beautiful and radiant. The scent reminds me of baby lotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m in love with this product that I received complimentary from La Mer. Not sure exactly what the magic is, but my skin looks and feels amazing using this cream, instantly transformed from day 1. I usually have dry skin and this seems to provide just enough hydration - so much that I could skip my usual night mask ritual. A little goes a long way - especially if you rub it in with your fingers before applying to your face. So yes, it is pricey, but yes, it is totally worth it. It does have a slight fragrance to it, but it is not overpowering or anything. Other than that is just a thick white cream that you can scoop it out of the jar and warm between fingers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is incredibly hydrating and works so perfectly for my dry, sensitive skin. I love that it reduces my redness and gives me a plump and glowing look. I would prefer the cream in packaging that reflects its decedent formula, the plastic seems a bit cheap when considering the price of this luxury product. Overall though, I think this is a fantastic product that gives real results for dehydrated and/or aging skin! This product was gifted by La Mer in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting to try La Met for years and I am so happy that I finally did. I received the product complimentary from La Met. A little bit goes a long way which is great given the price. I apply it at night and wake up with smooth, hydrated and feeling luxurious skin. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is a lot of hype about the brand La Mer. So I jumped at the chance to try it out. The Crème de la Mer has a very rich consistency and it is nice if you have dry skin. If you are oily, it might be a little too thick for your skin type. It was a little too thick for me right now since I have combination skin, so I will use it in the winter. I also noticed some fragrance ingredients and alcohol near the end of the list that I think La Mer should get rid of. At least it's not at the top of the list, and I'm glad that the fragrance isn't too strong or smell bad. Although, because of that and its huge price tag, I can't give it 5 stars, but I gave it 4 instead. I received this complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

My skin looks much more refreshed the next day and no more flakiness or dull looking skin. I was gifted a sample complimentary from La Mer and can’t wait to purchase the full sized product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying a La Mer product and this was a really great product to try! This product was received complimentary from La Mer for my honest opinion. The moisturizing cream felt thick without being heavy.  From a couple of uses I couldn’t really notice any difference in the appearance of fine lines/wrinkles or reducing redness, but I’m looking forward to using this sample over the next several weeks and see how my skin looks in a few weeks. If you’re looking to spend a little more on a skin care item, this would be a great selection.  I’m going to consider repurchasing when I run out.  A little bit goes a long way too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

I have very dry skin and I use it every night.I totally love how my face looks when I wake up in morning. I definitely recommend this product for purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from La Mer. I use this face cream all the time，Its anti-aging and moisturizing properties suit me well，Be sure to emulsify before using，I can feel my skin is soft，This is my daily essential product

reviews.review_text: I got complimentary from La Mer. It is a very dense, white cream in texture.  It is applied exclusively after you warm it up in your palms, I just rub them very quickly, it warms up, becomes transparent and I transfer it to my face with applying movements, the cream is applied EXCLUSIVELY in this way, thus, firstly, its beneficial properties are activated, and secondly  otherwise it is simply unrealistic to apply it.  My peeling on my face disappeared after 2 times of application.  The face, indeed, takes on a rested look, wrinkles from lack of moisture are smoothed out.  I really like the smell.  It may be a bit heavy for some people, but it doesn’t irritate me.  After using the cream, I do not observe any negative consequences ... The skin breathes, the pores are not clogged if the cream is applied correctly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

Cream de La Mer is an amazing product. Your face will feel like it's saying Thank You.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this Créme de La Mer The Moisturizing Cream.  A little goes a long way with this moisturizer and results are immediate and increase over time.  The first thing I noticed was how deeply my skin felt moisture.  It felt more firm and plump.  Fine lines seemed to smooth with the deep moisture.  I also noticed there was no tackiness of greasy feeling after applying.  Also, my makeup went on smoother and did not ‘roll up’.  I also enjoyed the light scent and the way my skin felt beautiful all day long until my nighttime routine when I used La Mer again.  Wearing it at night felt really restorative and like a night mask.  I enjoyed the smoothing effects and woke up looking super fresh.  I had no breakouts with this product, even though I have sensitive combination skin, prone to adult cystic acne.  La Mer’s The Moisturizing Cream is very gentle yet very effective.  I strongly recommend it an appreciate so much being gifted by La Mer this product to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Creme De La Mer moisturizing cream is a dream cream for dry and combination skin that is in need of moisture. You simply tap it onto your finger tips and pat it on your face until full coverage is met. I love the luxurious and silky smooth feel that it provides. This is a high quality product designed to pamper your skin! In my opinion it has a light floral scent that smells of the faintest gardenias. This is a top notch product with a top notch feel.  I received this product complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer 2 x 7ml deluxe samples of The Moisturizing Soft Cream. This lighter-weight cream delivers moisture into the skin's surface helping to heal dryness. Skin-supporting Miracle Broth™ helps protect from environmental stressors. Skin appears more vibrant and radiant upon application and looks visibly smoother and softer over time.  Ideal for combination / drier skin. Must try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer: When I think of luxury skincare only one product comes to mind...the Lamer Créme De La Mer! This cream is totally iconic for a reason! It is pure luxury from the time you open the jar until the very last drop. If makes my skin feel like silk and keeps me hydrated all day. If you don’t like fragrances in your skincare I would pass on this one, but I personally love the scent and it doesn’t irritate my skin at all. HOLY GRAIL STATUS!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent a deluxe sample of Crème de la Mer complimentary from La Mer for review purposes. This skin cream contains La Mer's signature Miracle Broth and to deeply hydrate and moisturize dry and sensitive skin. The scent is clean and lightly powdery. The cream itself is thick and rich. I apply by dotting a very small amount onto my skin, allowing it to warm slightly, and then gently distributing it over my face, neck, and decolletage. A tiny amount is all that is needed of this intensely moisturizing cream. I think it will be a bit too heavy for my skin during the summer months but will be perfect during the fall and winter when my skin tends to be more dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited when I was gifted by La Mer this creme de la Mer. I have to say I was expecting it to be amazing since it cost so much and supposedly all the stars are using it. Well I can’t say I know what the hype is all about.   I mean it’s very hydrating, it plumps a little and it did gives me glowing skin but I can and have gotten that from less expensive products. It also didn’t solve my dry skin issue.   It’s very thick in consistency, creamy, you warm it up by rubbing between your hands for a few seconds until it becomes translucent then you pat it on skin. A little goes a long way, if you use a lot you will probably end up with greasy skin. It has a sort of soapy scent which I don’t care for but I know others who loves it.  It’s made with a miracle broth which is a healing elixir. It says it soothes and renews skin. I guess with long term use you may get amazing results. I used for about a week.  I truly believe everything and every product works differently on everyone so I understand why some thinks it great. I think it’s good but not great and not worth the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size complimentary from La Met, which I’ve used for a week. Frankly, I think it’s better for more mature skin. It felt too greasy for my combination, acne-prone skin. It is gentle, so ok for sensitive skin. Personally, I expected a cream at this price point to be free of petrochemicals, but the second and third ingredients (after the “broth,” which is likely mostly water) are mineral oil and petrolatum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I find really great reviews about La mer moisturizer. I was very excited to get it complimentary from La Mer. I use it twice a day that is in the morning and at night before bed time. It absorbs very quickly into the skin and I love it’s smell. I don’t use scented products but I love this moisturizer’s smell. I didn’t notice any great effects on my skin yet because it’s only been a few days. I will keep using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer. This is my first time using La Mer skincare and I’m so impressed! When first applied I didn’t know what’s so special about it but within half an hour I felt my skin feeling more and more hydrated with time. I like to use it before bed because when I wake up my skin looks so much younger and hydrated - way better than masking everyday! Worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from La Met. When applied properly this lotion makes my skin glow, even in photos! I have noticed significant improvements in my problem areas (red spores at the top of my cheeks). Worth every penny in my opinion, I only wish there was a fragrance free option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always wanted to try this luxurious moisturizer and now I finally got a chance too “complimentary from La Mer” !!!! It definitely lived up To all of my expectations!! I love how you warm I’m up in between your hands and it’s so hydrating !!! My skin felt like a porcelain doll. This is the best product I’ve ever tried.

I received the Creme de la Mer complimentary from La Mer. The consistency is thick and creamy in the container, but it feels pretty lightweight when applied. A little goes a long way, so not much is needed to cover your entire face. I warm the moisturizer between my fingers before applying and it allows for less product to be used and makes it easily spreadable. Not a fan of the smell though. Overall the cream itself is great, but I find it to be incredibly overpriced and wouldn't be likely to buy it once it runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product gifted by LA Mer and I must say it will be going.on my list of holy grail products. I love the way it makes my skin feel and I love how less is more. It's easy to tell after warming up the product when it is ready to use. Over all I would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from La Mer  This cream is literally the creme del la creme of creams! You feel the luxuriousness of it with every use! It’s soaks into my skin almost instantly and low that only need a dollop and for the price this makes it worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is super rich.   My face and neck have some very dry patches and this product instantly helped both moisturize and soothe my skin.  Even though it is thick it does not make my skin greasy.  The scent is a little too powdery smelling for me.  However the scent does go away after a while.   The cream is perfect for daily use or after giving myself a facial.  This was complimentary from la mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer. This is a wonderful cream that does a great job moisturizing especially when my skin is feeling extra dry. It is lightweight, and a little product goes a long way. Upon application, it leaves my skin very smooth and supple; almost a silky suede feeling. I know it is pricy, but I highly recommend trying it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer. Creme de la mer has a great consistency, it does not feel heavy weight while moisturizes my skin very well. I have combination skin on the dryer side, which got even dryer this winter in Southern California, and this cream came to my rescue. You only need a little bit of the product to apply to the entire face, it is an investment cream by the amount of product used per application makes up for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this free from La Mer for review purposes. I had to try this out when I got the chance! It is extremely moisturizing. I’d say it’s best for pretty dry skin. I think it will be best for me in the winter when my skin is drier. I really don’t like the fragrance of this stuff. It’s not necessarily a strong scent, but it’s not pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Comes in a really nice packaging. Make sure you warm the Creme between your finger tips until it's translucent before you apply it. A little of the creme goes a long way as this product is thick, but very lightweight when applied. I received this complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from La Mer. This soft cream is really good, I can see already results on my skin that give me brighter and hydration to my face. I love it’s scent and texture which melt on skin after applying then my skin glow and hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this Moisturizer for a few days now and it is perfect! I can already see a difference. My face seems hydrated, firm and supple! I suffer from rosacea and I can already see it lightning up. A little goes a long way, this product is supper thick so I would highly recommend this moisturizer for the winter months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer! I love La Mer as a brand! I think their products are always the best quality and work so well with my skin! I recently tried the La Mer creme, and I fell in love. I love the consistency of this creme because it feels so lightweight yet it really moisturizes my skin. During these months, my skin has been extra dry, so this has really come to the rescue because I feel that the creme helps with my skin’s texture. I also love that a little goes a long way and that I only need to apply a little at a time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a complimentary from La Mer. This cream de la Mer is intensely moisturizing, shortly after I used it, I felt the skin on my face change. I have skin that is combined and very dry in certain areas of my face, but after using it my face feels very soft, plump and with a certain glow. Its texture is very creamy, smooth and with a very faint aroma, this cream feels very natural. When using it, you must put it in your hands and warm it with the natural heat of your body and then apply it directly to your skin. I really understand that it is very difficult for many people to be able to try it for the cost it has, but it is really worth it. Fully recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Incredibly hydrating moisturizer that is such a treat to use. A little goes a long way so even a small size will last a very long time. I received this gifted by La Mer, and while the cost might prohibit me from purchasing again my skin really loves this cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get the cream complimentary from La Mer. Like the moisture so much. It is rich enough to protect my sensitive and dry skin. And also the presentation of the cream is so delicate that I really enough my daily routine now! Highly recommended!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rich and luxurious, this is one of my favorite night time moisturizers. Its extremely rich and soaks so amazingly into my skin. I love this in the summer and winter when my skin is extremely dry. I wake up feeling hydrated and soft. I recieved this complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful texture moisturizer. I love it! It feels like cloud. I watched How to Video how to apply Creme de La Mer. Highly recommend to watch it before app. You need to warm Creme between your finger tips until translucent before applying. Despite the price tag it’s great. A little bit goes a long way. It’s very lightweight and absorbs quickly but gives good hydration for hours. It’s ideal for my skin and infused with famous Miracle Broth. Gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by La Mer for me to try! Wow! I love this product. It is so easy to apply, you take an little warm it with your fingers until it turns translucent and then apply it to your face. My skin looks so much better when I’ve been using it. This stuff is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received two 0.24oz jars of this amazing cream complimentary from La Mer. It is an extremely thick rich cream and you only need to use a little. I followed the directions of warming the cream between my finger tips before applying. The scent is very subtle. This gives my skin the right amount of moisture and hydration that is needed and I am amazed at how well it absorbs. My skin looks flawless after using this.  The product is pricey. It runs at a price of $95 for a 0.5oz and a 1oz for $190. I am hopeful that this will last a month or two. For those with very sensitive skin, this does contain a fragrance and mineral oil.  I really do not think you need to apply a serum if using this, as this has everything your wonderful skin needs to thrive. The perfect product for travelling, no need to lug all your other beauty products along.  I give this cream a 10/10. Definitely worth the investment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer the La Mer moisturizer so I could try it and see my honest opinion about the product, the first thing I noticed about the product was how delicate the presentation of this cream, in a cute velvet pouch, also I have to say my skin is sensitive and dry/patchy in a few areas, the texture of the cream is thick but a little goes a long way which been a expensive cream is a good thing, effective since the first use, it helped me get rid of the patches right away and it moisturize my skin immediately and left a glow which I love, it blended very well no white residue, my skin absorbed it lime it was thirsty for years, very pleased with the results

I have used moisturizers and many other products that leave my skin feeling soft and smooth...but nothing quite like this moisturizer.  I have read this is ideal for dry skin, however, it worked beautifully on my combination skin.  I can't quite explain how absolutely amazing my skin feels after using and for quite some time after.  I am not sure I could continue to afford this moisturizer, but I will need to try and find a way to continue to use it.  Gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my skin feels really hydrated, the feeling is fresh and light. I have tried many moisturizers but this one in particular pleases me since my skin is combination and few products manage to hydrate it without leaving it greasy gifted by la mer, thank you very much for allowing me to live the experience

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: La mer cream is the best cream I have used. This time I gifted by La Mer. I always stock a lot of when i catch a good price. Because it can recover my sensitive face skin. Every time I use it I put a little bit face oil and use my warm hand softer the La mer cream. When the color become transparent I can put on my face. It smells really light and joy. I will keep buying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer. This product looks and feels luxurious! The texture is just amazing! Fast absorbing and makes my skin silky soft! There is fragrance in it but it’s not too strong! I wish it would be a little more affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: l This was gifted by La Mer. Very thick consistency, smells nice and a little goes a very long ways! The smell reminds me of a grandma but i love it! Been using la mer for the last couple years and my skin loves it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer gifted by La Mer. I love the green bag and small box it's really luxurious. The price is expensive but it's worth it because it's a very rich cream that softens my skin and leaves a natural glow. This is my first time trying this product and I'll continue to use this in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great luxury cream. I was gifted this Creme de la Mer complimentary from La Mer. It so nice and thick with a silk like texture. You do not need very much at all! Immediately after use your skin is glowy and fresh. And I love the rose scent. It comes with quite the price tag but if it is in the budget, this cream is worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Lamer and this moisturizer is perfect. Just use a little bit of it, warn it up between your fingers before depositing it cause it makes a huge difference. Gifted by Lamer in exchange of my honest review. It smells really gooood!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer in exchange for my honest feedback. This cream truly is the most luxurious cream that I have ever tried in my entire life. Every time I use it it's such a treat because it feels so great on my skin. You have to make sure and follow the directions, you have to rub it between your fingertips until it becomes clear and then you've had it on your face. When applied properly, it leaves my skin feeling softer than it's ever felt before. It is how diminish my pores, and I think it's also made my skin tone more even. This product is definitely worth the hype, and it's definitely worth the price. If you want to treat yourself to something luxurious, this is the thing to get!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer. This product is smooth when applying to your face. It doesn’t leave any sticky feeling after applying. It dries fast leaving your skin feeling silky smooth. I would recommend this product if you have dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by La Mer in exchange for my honest review. I personally love this product. My wife said she also felt this product felt more moisturizing than the moisturizing soft cream. It definitely feels heavier, and helps my dry skin. I definitely won’t use it during the summer time, but during the fall/winter this is definitely a staple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love it.. it is so moisturizing and good for soft supple skin. I am loving it and using it as daily moisturizer and it makes skin super soft.

reviews.review_title: Pricey.. but really helped my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I took a star off because of the price. Otherwise, I think this is a great moisturizer. My skin is hydrated for 24 hours and feels incredibly smooth. It helps with oil control, my t zone and around my nose used to be super oily by midday but when I use LaMer, I’m oil-fee. This stuff literally cured my acne too. I had horrible breakouts that I couldn’t get rid of no matter what I used, until I tried this. Within a week my skin was completely clear, I couldn’t believe it. I don’t know if I’ll purchase it again because it’s so expensive but it definitely helped my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I Absolutely Can't say enough great things about this Cream de la mer !! It's very Rich , Softens fine lines and Hydrates ...While leaving a Thick and Moisturized barrier on my skin !! Love it soo much ❤️ I was Gifted by La Mer these products

Perfect for my skin I have normal to dry skin. I would recommend it to my friends. It is expensive but worth the price.
