reviews.review_text: I wanted this creme de la mer for long time because two of my friends have been using it saying it is one of the best products they had tried. I am 35 years old with dry skin. This is my biggest concern. This cream really hydrates my skin without any greasy feeling left in my skin. I apply this cream twice a day and already see the difference just in two days. Scent is amazing, texture is wonderful. I’m so glad I received this cream as complimentary from Creme de la mer for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: Buy it if you can look pass the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my ultimate favourite moisturizer hands down. I love the scent and how you don’t need much product for the most plump radiant looking skin. The price is high but it’s one of the best so it’s worth it. You don’t need too much product and make sure you warm up the product with your fingers before patting it on your face. I always go back to this moisturizer when I my skin needs a boost

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer and I've been enjoying this La Mer moisturizer! It's really nice on the skin and keeps my skin hydrated! The minis are great to try before committing to a full size, which I do like. A little goes a long way so this mini set will last me quite a bit!   This does have a fragranced scent as well. If you are sensitive to scents then I would suggest a patch test prior to. I've noticed my skin does look a bit plumper since using this moisturizer too! Love using it!   The only downside is how expensive the brand is lol. I would totally buy if they had more sales but even the minis are pricey for what you get.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer gifted me a sample of their Crème de la Mer and I can not be more happy & thankful! It was such perfect timing. I experienced severe irritation & sensitivity on my face during a recent travel experience & nothing helped. After using this product my skin completely healed and looks better than it did before! It neutralized any redness I had completely, nourished my skin with deep moisture yet doesn’t leave me oily & sits great under make up. I have acne prone skin & the fact that it has not caused me to break out is so big for me. I honestly feel so good without make up these days thanks to La Mer. I use it as my day time moisturizer, very little goes a long way, and warming it up on your fingers before applying is very important. If you have dry skin, or any irritation & sensitivity this product is definitely for you.  Thanks La Mer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer the La Mer moisturizing creams do it is amazing. Just a little goes a long way. It feels so luxurious as it soaks into your skin.  This is also a great under your makeup and will make it glide on. While this formula is not perfect for me but for those that have normal to dry skin it is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So luxurious! La Mer creme is so yummy. You are supposed to warm it between your fingers until translucent first so it's very soft and warm. Its very rich and soothes redness. I think it's overpriced! I was gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this complimentary from La Mer. I’m obsessed with this cream! I’ve been using this for about fifteen years. It’s the best moisturizer I’ve ever used. It’s very hydrating, it leaves your skin looking radiant, and feeling so soft. It doesn’t break me out. The scent is very clean. This is an excellent product and if you apply it correctly (as directed), a little goes a long way.

Just perfect!

reviews.review_text: La Mer has been the skincare for celebrities for as long as I can remember and the reason why is clear. reviews.review_text: This was my first La Mer product and wow! I now understand what the hype has been about. This made my skin feel so hydrated, soft, and glowy. It kept my face hydrated all night. Would highly recommend! Gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest review. Overall this product was great. This moisturizer was extremely hydrating and my skin felt wonderful after using it. My skin is normal to dry and this was the perfect formula for me. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks for lamer to gifted me a sample of this creme moisturizer. This lamer Cream is original moisture miracle of La Mer's five moisturizers. after using it for 1 week i Do see some of my Lines and wrinkles are  visibly repaired but not that visble. I have dry skin and still it fits me very well. I will definitely buy a large size Cream After i finish using it

La mer is a beautiful moisturizer that really packs a punch in terms of hydration! It's so thick I had to warm it up in my hands in order to apply it. I recommend this as a winter moisturizer as in the summer it kind of can be a little much for me in NYC. I love the way it smells and makes my face feel after. I received this product complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by La Mer. It is very luxurious!!! It smells really good and feels really good on the skin. Makes your skin so soft. It also absorbs beautifully and leaves skin moisturized and glowy throughout the day.  A little goes a long way. I guess it is worth to splurge if you want your skin feeling really good!

Creme de la Mer was gifted by La Mer, it is soft, smooth and hydrating. I’ve used it twice per day for over a week and noticed firmer and smoother skin. It’s best to use by warming it a bit between your fingertips and gently pressing onto skin for absorption. Great cream for skin firmness and hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received sample complimentary from La Mer for my honest feedback. I warmed the creme  between my fingers first before applying. It does give hydration and a little goes a long way however, scent is overwhelming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample gifted by la mer but I started use this product more than 10 years ago. It works best on dry skin or problem skin or when you have irritation. You need to follow the instructions otherwise very hard to apply evenly or you might apply too much. It’s a must for your skin problems.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: have tried ALOT of moisturizers,and I mean alot(over a dozen just in the last 3 months) so to be honest even tho I had heard good things about lamer I wasn’t to enthusiastic and figured it would just be one more that ended up in the junk drawer but let me tell you I was so wrong!There is a reason there is so much hype about this company and their products, they are truly amazing! This not only smelt wonderful and hydrated but it actually soaked into my skin leaving it super soft without feeling or looking greedy in anyway! This was truly the best I’ve ever had, it’s like the Hilton of moisturizer and if you haven’t tried it I recommend you do so today, it will replace everything else!  *Thank you lamer for this complimentary sample to try and rock my world! Gifted by LaMer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is everything you will ever need for a luxurious skin experience I love how soft and pretty my skin looks really good  feels amazing I have been using this cream for a while I highly recommended it.  I received Icomplimentary from la mer

I received this product as complimentary from La Mer. It's a very rich cream that softens my skin and leaves a natural glow. It works great especially when I have acne. It will also be great to use in cold and dry weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream feels and smells so luxurious!! As it should with such price tag!! My mom has used this cream for years and still does, she has dry and sensitive skin so this really has helped make it look hydrated. As for me, I have combo skin so I appreciate how it hydrated my dry spots but it looks a bit shiny on my forehead but not in a bad way. A little but goes a long way so although it's on the expensive side, the jar would last a decent amount of time. This was gifted to me by the brand but opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received my Creme de La Mer gifted by La Mer and I absolutely loved it. Definitely gonna splurge and buy the big bottle. Love how it makes my skin feel, super smooth, soft, plump and glowy. Absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My MUST-HAVE product! I have a dry, sensitive skin, and is very easy to be allergic to something (or anything). Whenever I feel itchy or irrational, I will use LaMer. It calms my skin and my emotion. Love it and use it forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer. First time trying this product and I was amazed how moisture my skin feels after the application. I follow the instructions, rubbing a small amount in my fingers until cream went smooth then apply it by touches in the face and neck. The next day my face was radiant. The only complaint is the smell, is to strong form me. I would prefer it odorless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is face caviar. It’s pure excellence you’re smearing on your face. The price is worth it. A little goes a long way! It’s very rich and decadent and just the tiniest amount covers your entire face. I wish I could bathe in it. I absolutely recommend this to everyone. It makes my skin feel incredible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried this La Mer Creme de la mer a couple times before and I have to say it is okay is it worth the crazy high price i don't think so but it does leave your skin feeling moisturized and soft. But for me it is just not worth the price. Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The moisturizer is very rich and thick, and once applied, it's very soothing on dry skins. The scent is pretty nice too. Just remember to warm it first until it becomes translucent. Received this product as complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is complimentary from La Mer. The cream is very moisture when it applied on my face, my face became less oily as before I using this product. The scent of the cream is very good too. Recommended to purchase it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received complimentary from La Mer. This cream has good moisture but don’t leave my face feeling greasy. My skin gets dry on nose, this cream works like magic!! Can also relieve skin itchiness. Amazing crème.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the complimentary from La Mer. I have wanted to try this product for so long and it definitely didn’t disappoint! It feels so luxurious and makes my skin feel so soft. I was a little worried it would be too heavy on my oily skin but it actually works amazing. Highly recommend if you have dry skin I think your skin would soak it right up! It doesn’t feel heavy and keeps me feeling moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer , it is very hydrating and comfortable to wear both for day and night . It is good for sensitive skin like mine not harsh. Feels very luxurious on the skin. I noticed softer skin, it felt healthier I was gifted by lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok this is some cool Witchery  first of all you need to warm the Crème between your finger tips until translucent before applying. Not to mention a little goes a long way.i highly recommend this product. complimentary from La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample from the brand but I started use this product more than 10 years ago. You don't feel how good it is until you stopped using it. It calms problem skin very much but you must follow the instruction to use it otherwise it will be too thick and hard to apply. I found it also melted with some serum well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't like that it's so expensive but it's a nice rich cream. Moisturizing and hydrating. Absorbs well and I like the ingredients. Its early to see any visible difference but I like it so far. The packaging it came in is luxe. I was gifted by La mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i have really dry skin, sensitive, acne prone. THIS IS MY HOLY GRAIL!! my skin feels so nicee. after 1 week of use. i already can see a huge improvement on my skin. 10/10 would recommend for dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: All I can really say about this cream is wow, ever since I received my product, I have had nothing but great experiences. This cream when applied to my skin definitely does it all. My skin feels so refreshing and soft. The only down side is it’s price

reviews.review_title: Great investment for healthy looking skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by La Mer Jn exchange for an honest review. A rich facial cream that helped me heal my dryness, promotes soft and supple skin, and visibly softens lines and wrinkles. While testing Crème de la Mer, I swapped it in for my usual night cream, as per the direction I warmed it a bit between my fingers until the thick cream became translucent, then patting it into my skin. The instructions recommend using it both day and night, it made my skin baby bum soft.. I now started applying a dab or two to, particularly dry zones after my usual daytime routine when necessary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OVERPRICED.Its literally just cerave or any other drugstore moisterizer.Its oily and hydrating.Just not worth 95-500 dollars.Choose anyother drug store or some sort of moisterizer that isnt as pricey as this product is.

reviews.review_title: Creme de la Crème of Moisturizers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the moisturizers I’ve ever used. My skin tends to dry out and I have to balance it the hydration between winter and summer so I don’t get acne. This moisturizer works for both extremes. My skin feels so fresh and balanced that I’ve stopped wearing makeup because it has been so flawless that my friends and coworkers think I’m wearing makeup. I wish this was more affordable. I use it sparingly every week after my exfoliation so my ski is really drinking it up. Haven’t tried the other la mer products but I have to say this is the BEST.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing cream! The first week I started using it, my face broke out! But after that my skin became soooo even! Worth the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I saw this in the latest LUXE box I figured it was my opportunity to try it, to see what all the fuss is about.  While writing this review I’ve had it 9 days.    It is a very heavy cream and the directions advise not to rub in, but to pat and press into skin.  The special instructions did make using it feel “fancy” ( for lack of a better word).  I used it only at night but there is no way I could apply primer, sunscreen and makeup over this heavy cream.  ( believe me , I tried and it was a fail in 90° heat)   When I woke in the morning, my face was smooth and glowy  and baby soft.  I loved it as a nighttime cream and I believe it did it’s job as a moisturizer.  Here’s the thing.   It’s not  $300 good.  Ive used other $50 moisturizers that are HG’s  for me.   Don’t get me wrong, I’ll use the heck out of a free sample.  It just wasn’t impressive enough to get me on the LaMer bandwagon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DONT BUY IT!!!!!!!!! Hands down, worst moisturizer I’ve ever used. People are obsessed with it just because of the price. It is impossible to spread on your skin. It’s like rubbing stale peanut butter on your face.

reviews.review_title: IF YOU CAN AFFORD IT, BUY IT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is like butter for your skin that leaves your face shine all day without an oily/greasy look. It penetrates deep into the skin, has a very nice light scent to it, and has a consistency different to any other moisturizer I have ever tried. While the price is sort of insane, I would reserve this product only for those who have high income as there are other alternatives that are cheaper such as Belif or Tatcha. Mind you, this indulgence will leave your skin looking amazing all day and will absorb during the night, making you look like you just stepped out of a facial all throughout the day. I couldn’t be happier. Just got the La Mer Moisturizing Soft Cream and will compare. From first glance and use, I must say the Creme de La Mer stands out much more and will likely be my go-to for a while once I purchase the much larger version as these ones were only the 15ml for a test run. La Mer is truly the cream of the crop in beauty products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the La Mer  Moisturizing Cream as complimentary from La Mer . One of the best moisturizing cream I tried so far . It super smooth and it has lightweight texture. My face feel super smooth without looking oily.A little goes a long way. This cream is luxurious. I highly recommend  it . My favorite moisturizer

reviews.review_title: now I know how a bell pepper feels
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In the US, some fruits and vegetables are coated in a thin layer of edible wax before being transported, to maintain freshness. I think this “crème” works the same way. I also think it made me break out. Not really a home run product for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer. Love this moisturizer and how it feels on my skin. A little definitely goes a long way with this product which is nice and it lasts on my skin all day. Hydrates my skin without feeling oily which was a plus and is super light weight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer will transform your skin. Keeps you well hydrated in the winter months. I pair this with La Mer eye concentrate and LaMer oil to seal it all in. I use to get Botox. Haven’t had too in two years, just by using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There is a lot of hype and huge cult celebrity following for this product.  After using this product for a few weeks, I am a little disappointed by my results.  Yes deeply moisturizing - almost too much.  After applying, I felt it was too heavy - almost greasy. I'm 50 and I do have dry skin but the texture was just a little too heavy for me.  In the morning, I didn't notice a big difference. For the price and the description, there are other moisturizers that provided me with noticeable results and not the heavy feeling.  For those that got good results - great.  Just not me. Good luck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love it, but the smell and texture are identical to Nivea...at this price I’d expect it to “wow” me and it definitely didn’t....will not be rebuying.  Save yourself $94.00 and buy a ton of Nivea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer I have been a La Mer lover for so many years it is so expensive but it is the best I have used when it comes to my skin and absolutely love this cream it smells amazing and leaves my skin feeling smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fresh scented moisturizer is lightweight but rich in moisture.  I loved the way my skin felt after applying the moisturizer.  Very smooth, soft, and supple. I can’t wait to see long term results from using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Looking at the ingredient list La Mer is mineral oil, lanolin and glycerin and a ton of fragrance. Does it moisturize my skin? Yes. Does it improve it ? There is literally nothing in this that will do that. The price is ridiculous for what is a pretty average moisturizer. I tried it bc it’s one of those hyped celeb products I had to try before I die. Not worth the hype or money. Better formulated moisturizers out there for much less money. Save your money. Invest in better skin care!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sooo good. i have struggled with acne forever and this helped so much. my skin isnt so dry but i definitely feel very hydrated after using this. i 100% see a difference the next morning after every time i use it. If you already have good skin, don’t expect there to be much difference when you use. But i can see results because i have bad skin. in case it helps anyone this is my routine:  -dermalogica precleanse  -dermalogica special cleansing gel -dermalogica micro exfoliant  -caudalie salicylic acid toner (or laneige if i need more hydration) -la mer crème de la mer  -murad spot treatment  i have tried SOOO many products and this is finally what’s been helping the most.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So here’s the thing... You know the brand Nivea? You know their soft cream? The $2 one? This is the exact same thing. Same ingredients, same texture and feel. The only difference is the packaging and the ONE algae ingredient that BY THE WAY, cost less than $1 to use. Price not justified whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is gifted by Lamer. My skin look much better as a result. I had extremely dry skin but this moisturizer helped a lot to make it softer, smoother and hydrated. A little amount goes long way. It also has a light weight texture. I am very happy with this product. I would highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream doesn’t seem super thick when you first apply however a little goes a long way and it really does moisturize all day. I am not a huge fan of the scent but it’s not horrible. I have eczema prone skin that leaves patches near my eyes and mouth creases and this cleared it up within a day. My face looks great, has a glow and feels healthier.Thankful I was complimentary gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Lamer beauty for my honest review. It’s simply the best product, a dense, rich cream In my opinion, the price is very high so this cream really will be work. Yes, it works. Smell consistent, it’s a reliable treatmen for soothing, hydration and redness relief. You will not be disappointed with cream although it’s really “rich cream”

reviews.review_title: Not worth the hype (or the price)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For years I wanted to try this product!  It seemed so luxurious.  And it is luxurious.  It feels great going on.  It has a light fragrance, almost fragrance free.  But I'm going to be honest with you, it is just NOT worth the price.  I used a small sample jar, then a large jar, then another sample (so I gave it a good chance) and I still had dry skin.  I went to CVS and purchased some Eucerin cream for extremely dry skin, and in a week, my dry skin was cleared up.  Now, I have normally dry skin, so perhaps if your skin is oily, this might work for you.  But if you have to break your budget to buy it, my advice is, DON'T.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like diaper cream. I have no clue why it’s so expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Used this moisturizer years ago and stopped. So glad I tried it again love it. Feels so good to use again missed it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing your skin is one of the most important steps in your skin care routine, so I never buy cheap moisturizer! I started using La Mer when I turned 35. I saw it as an investment in my skins health and wellness. I love this product. Because of the price (and lack of SPF) I only use it at night. It lasts me about 3-4 months. I only use a little and apply as per La Mer's specific instructions. The texture is very smooth but thick. Putting it on at night feels like rubbing your face in velvet. My boyfriend always compliments me on my glowing skin and have been mistaken for a women in her late twenties. Its expensive...but for me, its worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I could give this 20 stars!  I’m 47 and have been using this cream for 4 years now. Prior to finding it I struggled to find anything that would soothe the skin around my nose and mouth. It was red and irritated and constantly stinging (was not rosacea).  I tried everything from over the counter to high end and when I finally found this I felt like I hit the lottery. If you have aging dry skin this is a godsend. It is rich and soothing and in addition to calming the places I have dry, irritated skin it has also made the rest of my skin glow. It truly is a miracle cream. I highly recommend for those who’s skin concerns are similar to mine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: It’s not very hydrating, drugstore moisturizer has better hydrating effect

reviews.review_title: Cannot understand the hype about this cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Completely do not understand this product.  It looks, feels and smells like Nivea.  Very greasy and un luxurious.  Gooes on and smells like foot cream.  I cannot understand the hype about this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free sample, and I've never had a moisturizer drastically change my skin over night! This product is amazing! I love it, but the price is outrageous. I wish I knew that before using it so generously. I will now treat it like liquid gold and cherish my tiny free pot of it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG if you haven’t made your mind about La Mer Creme you shouldn’t think twice, this is an amazing moisturizer. After we one apply I saw the difference in my skin no joke! It’s thick but not that thick like many sais it was, I would definitely get the soft creme as well to try. I bought the 1 oz I should’ve bought the 2 oz at least.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a nice cream and I didn’t have any bad reaction to it, however this was no different than any other thick creamy moisturizer like nivea or glamglow, i find it to be super similar to glamglow good in bed, which got discontinued. I loved it but it was only $35 for a large jar. I do NOT mind paying for luxe beauty I’m a huge fan of Chanel, Dior and Armani makeup products and also love tatcha. This is just not worth the price, I’m sorry. Not bad but 1 star bc of price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok all I know is before I started my Lamer journey about 5 years ago, my skin was veryyyy sensitive, red, easily irritated so most medical grade moisturizers I couldn’t handle. So I bit the bullet and splurged. I did add the SK-II essence as well. That has been my routine now for years. NEVER HAD IRRITATION, ITCHINESS, REDNESS EVER AGAIN. It’s builds up your natural barrier if that makes sense. I’m early 40s now and I still get carded at the liquor store (total stretch but I giggle every time and I’ll take it! The last clerk told me “girlll whatever skin care routine you’re doing , keep it up”) ..sooo I’ll leave it at that. Does it seem like Nivea, sure but water the heck from the sea is in it, it does HEAL and PROTECT. I’m a believer:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have naturally dry skin & received a sample jar of this. I would say that it feels & appears no different than other facial creams like jars of Nivea. However I did notice after an hour or so after applying it, my face felt softer and hydrated after absorbing the cream. It didn’t feel oily or anything. I’m glad I got to try it, but I am personally not in the bracket of women who are confident & willing to spend nearly $200 on moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The skin around my eyes recently decided to rage against the winter dryness and left me with days of swollen puffy itchy skin. Like, I could hardly see, it was so swollen. After a lot of rest and hydrocortisone cream, I finally got it down to just red and severely flakey. I happened to have a sample of this La Mer product just arrive in the mail, dabbed it around my eyes, and all of that was gone within a half hour. I couldn't believe it. And now I'm a fan!  This stuff is the thickest moisturizer I've ever used, like cement, but warming it up a bit in your fingers really helps. And the price is ridiculous. I'm going to find a dupe, but still keep this on hand for emergencies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer makes my skin feel and look better than anything I’ve ever used.  It’s worth every penny!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells EXACTLY like The Nivea Creme I use to moisturize my knee caps and elbows. I tried the sample size of this product and was really expecting something different. The formula has the same smell and thick texture as Nivea creme ($5), so I’m confused by the price point of this product. Does anyone know if the ingredients are similar? I’m a little hesitant to continue to rub an expensive Nivea Creme dupe on my face skin...   I applied a little La Mer to my very dry face skin this morning. It certainly moisturizes but the smell is cheap and lingers around the nostrils. I’m hoping this won’t break me out given the thick formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I swear by medical grade skin care & let me tell you this is The most amazing cream ever, makes my skin look so firm, and it just absorbs right into the skin. My makeup looks so flawless ontop of it. I love layering my serums so by the time I get to my moisturizer it’ll usually pill if it doesn’t sit right w my skin but I’ve never had a problem w la mer. I’ve had the 2 oz one for almost 2 years and I’m not even running out yet. I only use a pea size amount in the am on my face. So you do get what you pay for if you use it right (;

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Here is the thing, I used my mom's and felt like nothing fancy in there. The fragrance is strong and the creme is thick. I know you can only see result in the long time, but I have an oily skin so... pass

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For those saying it’s thick and hard to put on, you’re doing it wrong. Follow the box instructions and dab a tiny amount on two fingertips and then press them against the fingertips on your other hand to warm up. The consistency will change and become more liquid and then you can put it on. A tiny amount can be used to completely hydrate the face. The 2 oz jar lasts me well over a year normally. Also, my skin is flawless from it. I’ve used it for 10 years and I’m almost 40 and still have smooth and young skin. I’ll let La Mer take the credit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream makes your skin feel as soft as a cloud! It absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave behind any residue, so it won’t dirty your pillowcase at night. The scent is pleasant and not overpowering. The La Mer moisturizer is one of my favorite face creams (the other is the Tatcha Silk Cream).

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was such a big moment when I got my first jar of La Mer and I was pleasantly surprised by how nice the product felt.  A little truly goes a long way which I was not expecting, given the hype and price tag.  My skin does feel more moisturized after daily use but I am not sure it is truly THAT incredible.  I do agree that there are other, cheaper products out there that would be just as good.  It is a nice luxury if you can afford it but I am not sure I would go so far as to say it is the GOAT.

reviews.review_title: This cream really isn’t for you.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The fact of the matter is that there is simply cheaper and better products out there. La Mer has been coasting off their name for a long time but their concept and execution is soo outdated. This particular cream is clearly for elderly women of a certain status, it is not for every day hydration. Incredibly comedogenic.

reviews.review_title: Like but not love! Still a great product though
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I give this product a 4 because I wasn't expecting it to be a thick moisturizer. Application is not as smooth as I expected it.  It has a great smell and is VERY rich. I like it on days when i'm feeling dry and need an extra boost of hydration throughout the day. I think the soft cream might be more for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this moisturizer but it was definitely not worth $190 for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Read the ingredients please. Mineral oil really???

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cream! I love the thick and creamy texture. The little trick is to warm it between your fingers for a few seconds before applying it to your face. I read some people were saying they had to add water.. but it’s not the case, you just are to warm it in-between your fingers to activate the ingredients.  I purchased 2 60ML of these babies!  It makes my face look a little oily, but I mainly use this at night ... or if it’s the day, i just have a dewy look. I love La Mer products!    Plus, the glass jars make a cute little decor piece to display your high end products.

reviews.review_title: Works Well, but Price Not Justified
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a product that I've wanted to try for years, but was put off by the price.  I do like this cream.  It seems to be helping with my dry skin issues (I'm older and also using Tretinoin, which is very drying).  This cream smells great and is a good texture; however, it's so thick that you need a lot to spread it all over your face, thus is gets used up quickly.  I don't see enough of a difference over less expensive creams, so I probably won't get this again.

reviews.review_title: Miracle Broth/It’s an Essence of Probiotics
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, it took me awhile to figure this cream out, but the reason people rave about it is this: the inventor discovered fermenting creates wonderful probiotics for your skin. For decades, they have been using “essences” in Korea, Japan and Asia, which is just taking off now in the US. These essences are probiotic broths- just like this cream. Yes I wish the jar was cuter, yes it’s thick and you can overdo it, but I use it strictly at night, after diffusing it slightly in my fingers, and always after retinol. It is nourishing and hydrating!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like butter for my face. So moisturizing!!! I am in love with this product, I feel it is totally worth the price if you can afford to splurge. A little goes a long way (I like to heat it up in my hands so it goes on smoother, practically melting on my face). I have noticed a difference in how my skin appears, just brighter, more hydrated, happy skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: - texture: very thick and it has to be dragged across the skin - hydrating: SO hydrating my skin stays moisturized all day and never have to reapply even in cold upstate NY winters - smell: it does smell like baby powder but it’s light enough it doesn’t bother  - packaging: the packaging is heavy and feels premium - price: yes it’s expensive but it is la mer  Overall the formula is really nice and does the job. The only problem for me is how thick it is, it almost feels like I am creating wrinkles by trying to drag the formula across my skin. Haven’t decided if I will buy again or switch to an equally pricey, dermatologist brand

reviews.review_title: amazing, a little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s very expensive but really worth it. A little goes a long way in the bottle will last you over a year

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hard pass for me. The texture is super thick and it smells like baby powder. The package is plastic and the amount of moisturizer you get for the price is ridiculous. In my opinion, there are other products that are worth your money if you want to splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is definitely overpriced, and maybe overhyped in a way that people think think this formulation is for them. This cream is super thick and moisturizing, but it could definitely be too thick for a lot of skin types. My skin is so much plumper and younger looking (mid 30s) after 2 months of use. I do not use often on my t-zone, but use a dab on my cheeks up the sides of my face. It is thick, so you are meant to rub it between your fingers to warm it up and make it easier to spread. This cream is most like Embryolisse, my favorite French pharmacy cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The texture is nice but the ingredients in this are really inexpensive (the list begins with Algae Extract, Mineral Oil and Petrolatum so that being the majority of the product should give you some idea). Someone please explain to me what ingredient is worth so much $$$. Easy pass, move on. Also if you are acne-prone please be aware that algae/seaweed extract can be really pore-clogging for some people

reviews.review_title: Amazing and not just for dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin and didn't expect this to work for me... Bitter-sweetly, this is the best cream I have EVER used, my skin looks and feels completely amazing after using this for less than a week, morning and night. The formula also somehow miraculously balances my combo skin, making my tzone the same level of glowy/matte as my cheeks -- basically, I don't even need primer or oil-absorbing powder anymore to keep my oil at bay, because this cream is so perfect. I love it and because of how obscenely expensive it is, I hate that I love it, but this is the one for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this after receiving this in a Sephora Favourites. I know there is a lot of hype about this, but I was so surprised at how “regular” it was. It is basically Nivea creme and even stinks like Nivea drug store cream. It was hydrating, and for someone who likes fragranced heavy creams this would be ok, but for the price, go but the Nivea instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive purchased this stuff right before every one of my spinal surgeries. Ill usually put it on once maybe twice a day for at least a month. All of my scars have healed a normal skin color and theyre not bumpy. Once im done putting it on my scars ill use the rest on my face if i pick at a zit or im super dry. I wouldnt buy this regularly. Its just too pricey for me. However ill drop the money right before surgery.

reviews.review_title: this is not for oily, acne-prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointed. Please save your money. This didn't do anything to my skin at all. It is not worth the hype. Also, the cream does not glide over the skin well.

reviews.review_title: Not good for sensitive/acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finally bit the bullet and decided to splurge on the small bottle since my skin was terribly dry due to the winter season. Unfortunately after a couple days of using it my skin broke out. It did somewhat help moisturize my skin but my skin did not tolerate it. It has a slight fragrance to it and the packaging feels very heavy and luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin and adult acne. My acne is not terrible, but the goal is to have beautiful skin and you can’t have that with acne. I personally didn’t care for this cream. It was SO THICK. I had to scoop up a quarter of the jar just to get enough for my whole face. I also did not like the way it went on. Usually a moisturizer gently slides on your face and you can feel it moisturizing, not this one. I feel like I had to use so much of the product and it just felt heavy sitting on my face. I don’t think I’ve used it long enough to see if it effected my acne, but overall I would only recommend if you are older looking for a rich moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this. I bought the Chinese New Year Sephora favourites set just to try this one product in fact. I cannot express how disappointed and confused I am about the hype surrounding this cream. The smell is very much like fresh linen/ laundry soap. Not so overpowering that it makes me feel sick, but strong enough that I can smell the cream on my face. The worst thing about this cream is the texture and thickness though. I can’t think of anything to compare it to except baby diaper cream. It has such a thick white texture like diaper cream or possibly natural zinc sunscreen. When I put it on my face it made my face look very very greasy. It soaked in a little bit but I had to wash most of it off because it felt and looked so greasy. I am confused about the ‘miracle’ that this cream is supposed to be. If I had bought it for $5 at the supermarket, I would say it would have been fair value as a product to put on the dry skin on my feet for instance, but I certainly would not be interested in putting this on my face again. No thanks La Mer, I will keep my money and skip the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Leaves my skin smooth, plump, firm, glowing and hydrated! Make sure you use it properly, take a small amount between your fingers, melt the cream and pat into skin. This may not be good for younger skin though, might be too rich, I’m in my 30s so it’s perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this. Does it hydrate, absolutely!! It did wonders for my dry skin however, it made me break out like I never have. I never break out and I am so upset with my skins appearance. I think this is just too heavy and pore clogging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is way too over fragranced, feels greasy after application, and isn’t worth the price. I expected much more from this product due to the hype and price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best cream ever! Yes it is expensive but literally a little goes a long way and it is good for 24 months ... 2 years!!! That means if this is the only cream you are using every day ....It only costs $21.65 Canadian per month. Depending on your skin chose the right la mer cream for your skin type. If you are like me, dry, eczema prone with the occasional pimple here or there. Get the creme de la mer moisturizer. A good cleanser, this cream and a good active ( ie: retinol, lactic, vitamin c, salicylic ...etc) is all you will need. Think of all the money you spend at Sephora anyway!  Lol. This review is NOT sponsored I just love this cream! Note: the 0.5 oz/15ml lasted me well over a year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used more than 10 jars of La Mer cream. This is the first one has fragrance added to it. It is very usually as La Mar is known as using nature ingredients. I really doubt whether this is a fake one. Also, the fragrance smells cheap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to see what all the fuss is about with this product, now I know it is one of the best moisturizers I have ever tried that is why I rated it a 5 star

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There is no better heavy moisturizer! I have really dry and sensitive skin and this is the only product that works, keeps face moisturized all day and removes redness. It's pricey, but deff worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! The best face cream I have ever used. It’s very hydrating and soothing. The only downside of this cream is that it has fragrance. I really wish they can take that fragrance out of the ingredient list then it would be perfect for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Expensive but sooooo nice! It has a soft, classic scent that isn't too overpowering. It feels rich and thick on your skin, but still absorbs quickly and easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There is nothing better. The end. I’ve tried so many other moisturizers and nothing can compete with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this for a long time and finally decided to get it. My skin is sensitive and couldn’t find the right moisturizer but this one does amazing job my skin is soft and it smell good. It’s worth what you pay for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i LOVE this moisturizer. it’s rich but light at the same time. it’s so soothing on my face and makes it feel hydrated. it is 1000% worth it for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Major disappointment. Thought the price reflected the quality, but this isn't any better than much less expensive brands.  Total waste of money and has not improved my dryness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this because of the hype, but the product and the price point just don’t add up. The fragrance is very strong and the cream does not glide smoothly over the skin. Very disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The absolute GOAT of skincare. If you want to wake up with perfect glowy supple skin, BUY THIS. Worth every freakin penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Many years ago I used La Mer to help my skin with intense dryness due to an acne product.  After this almost a full year of quarantine, my skin has been a mess and nothing seemed to help until I tried this old friend again. My constant flaky, dry, miserable looking skin is soft, supple, and looking so much better. It’s worth every penny and then some.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So soft and moisturizing   Pricey, but worth the investment. Leaves skin plump and smooth. Smells great too. Not highly fragranced. If you love your skin, you’ll love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Incredible. I can't say enough about this product. The price is steep but it is worth it if you are like me and will shell out for a good skincare product. I use it as a night cream because it is heavy and thick but my skin can get very dry - if you have dry skin this works wonders. I always get compliments on my skin since I started using it and now cannot live without it. If you are on the fence, do it!!! It is life changing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizes fine, however, the scent is overpowering. I’ve used moisturizers comparable to this one at half the price point. Not worth it, imo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received a small sample jar. The texture, finish, and scent kind of reminds me of bad cold cream. The texture is thick but thins and spreads as it warms on the skin. Felt rather greasy after all. Moisturizes fine but not as well as I would like (I have normal skin). It didn't do anything great to my skin but also didn't break it out or irritate it either. The scent is vile, however. A cloying floral scent, which I hate (I'm picky about scents). Others may find the scent appealing but I wouldn't dream of spending so much on a less-than- mediocre texture and moisturizing experience that also smells so bad. There are much better products out there.

reviews.review_title: Too thick, heavy, and caused pimples.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have wanted to try this product for a couple of years now so I finally splurged. For context I am 37 years old with fairly dry skin but is otherwise unproblematic. Within an hour of applying this moisturizer for the first time I had several tiny whiteheads around my mouth nose and cheeks. The consistency was very thick almost like an A&D cream or a Desitin diaper cream. I did not find that it went on smoothly and I can only imagine it would be very difficult to mix in a serum. Not to mention a $95 Price tag for half an ounce which means I would go through this jar in about two months. If it had been luxurious and impressed me I would’ve been willing to spend the money but this cream was definitely a huge disappointment. I even let my husband try some to get his thoughts and he was in agreement that it was very heavy and oily. It did keep my face hydrated all day but it also had a very heavy greasy feel to it. My skin felt like it could not breathe. I love a moisturizer that melts in and feels silky. This didn’t do that for me. I wanted to love this but unfortunately I will be returning it and sticking with Eve Lom, Tatcha, and YSL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is wonderful; I feel it on my skin for hours after I apply it. It has a softening effect and has helped with the wrinkles under my eyes, even though I am not supposed to put it there - I put it on the lateral orbits of the eye - just barely where the crow's feet begin. What a game-changer!    It smells great but I will say the smell is not laden with chemicals or artificial perfume. The moisture this cream provides is unlike any other product I've tried (and I have been trying for 20 years).   Perhaps the best part is it doesn't leave a residue or irritate my skin -- it just softens my skin, the wrinkles seem less obvious, and for the few days I have had it, I would say it's a very powerful cream. I must say I am pleasantly surprised.

reviews.review_title: Definitely worth the price for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is the ONLY one that works on my extremely dry flaky skin. I’ve tried everything from Clinique, Claris, and Fresh to Olay and L’Oreal. The only reason I give it 4 stars is that it is VERY expensive. That being said, if anything is worth the money it’s my skin, especially when the product works as well this does for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had been wanting to try this product for a long time but was put off by the price. I finally went for it, and was *really* surprised about HEAVILY fragranced it is. I thought it was for sensitive skin? I admit I didn't even put it on my face as I could already imagine how much my face would sting and turn red. I was surprised and disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and tried it. Not worth the hype or the price because within 5 days I had super dry, cracked areas on my skin. So glad it was just a freebie and I didn’t waste any real money on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made my skin break out! I initially thought it could be related to hormonal acne. But no. After switching to my previous tatcha cream I did not notice any new spots. Then after restarting it, I found that I broke out again... I’m glad I only bought the travel size kit! I will not be repurchasing or recommending this to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin type is normal, but during the colder months, my skin is dries out. I had dry patches and lifeless skin this few fall months. In my life I tried many other moisturizers such as Tatcha Water Cream, Drunk Elephant Lala retro and Protini, Aqua Bomb by Belif, Fresh products etc. They work ok, no complaints, but I had full box of supporting tonics, serums, oils... La mer makes my life simplier. Now I don't need skincare routine with 25 steps in the morning and 35 steps in the evening. I just wake up, clean my face with any soap, apply scoup of la mer cream and thats it. My skin is so soft and glowing! Cream looks thick but you would be amazed how good it absorbs into skin. No pimples, no dryness, no problems at all. I'm sure that every skin is unique, its normal to try product before investing in it. Too bad it's super hard to find La Mer sample. I wouldn't know it is working if I didn't get it as present. Its definitely too risky to buy such expensive cream without samples. I wish La Mer would create promo with Sephora and give customers 5-10 mini samples so people could try it and decide is it worth buying for them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve just started for 3 days and this product made my face and neck so smooth. A bit pricey but worth it. I LOVE the smell and how it feels on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is my first time using this cream and I am very happy with the result it is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My forever Holy Grail! I have been using Creme de la Mer for over 10 years and I have never found anything better. It hydrated, smooths, clears dark spots, and just makes my skin look so supple and healthy in a way no other cream can. People always think I’m 10 years younger than what I am and a contributing factor to that is due to how meticulous I am with my skincare. I wash twice a day, tone, moisturize with La Mer, use a facial steamer and follow up with high-quality masks. Yes, I know, La Mer is expensive, but in life you get what you pay for and the end justifies the means. If it is a value for you to maintain gorgeous skin then you won’t mind the price due to the value you place on yourself. Thank you La Mer for your amazing products. Literally going to keep using this until I’m like 90! Also, the mini is perfect for traveling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I did a lot of research before splurging on this moisturizer- Youtube reviews, Sephora reviews, random articles... and the results were mixed. Since quarantine my typically oily skin has become dry, flakey, painful and itchy. No amount of DE Protini and hydrating facial oils helped :( a week with Creme de la Mer and I am glowing! I use it twice a day and the dry itchy flakes are almost completely gone! This is the only thing that has helped me feel and look like myself, I am so thankful! Do be sure to read the instructions- warm in your fingers and pat into skin for results. This is a life saver, but I can see how it's not for everyone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obviously it’s really expensive for a moisturizer but it’s honestly worth it if you are able to budget for it and it’ll last a lot longer than you’d think for the size.  You use a pretty small amount. I got the 2oz at the start of quarantine and I’ve just barely made a dent in it now, around 8 months later. It’s not worth going into debt but it’s worth the price if you can swing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just read the ingredients. It’s iconic because back in the day it was sought-after and used by models, celebrities, etc. That was back then and there wasn’t the information and competition plus access to the multitude of amazing products today. Mineral oil, petroleum, lanolin are all cheap and potentially irritating ingredients. I’ve used this and it will moisturize and leave your with a glow, it’s very thick and only recommend for use at night time. There are other great products at a fraction of the price or equally priced or more expensive, it’s not the price but the lack of quality ingredients and scientific evidence that gets me. It’s not to be rubbed in, warm it up between fingers amd pat in to skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream. It is a tried and true amazing moisture bomb. My skin is so radiant in the morning. I love to pair it with Sunday Riley’s A+ serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I don’t know what it is, but they’re doing something right. I’ve tried so many other less expensive options and keep coming back to La Mer. This cream blends perfectly with all sunscreens and foundations I use and doesn’t ever look like there is too much product build up or leave a cakey look. My skin is super dry in some areas (around the nose or mouth) and oily in others (forehead) and this moisturizer seems to even everything out. After using the cream consistently for months, I also noticed a scar on my face start to improve, especially the redness. I’ll continue to repurchase and stop wasting money on continuously trying out less expensive products that I end up not using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!! It's very expensive, indeed, but it's an amazing product. It saved my skin while I was on Accutane. I've been using it since 4 years now, and I would recommended it to everyone. I use the Crème de la Mer during Fall and Winter season, and I use the Soft La Mer during Spring and Summer season.  A size 2oz can last me about 8-9 months, using it twice a day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have superrrrrr dry and sensitive skin! This cream is so expensive so I only use it in the fall/winter when it’s really really dry! If I use it for two nights straight my skin condition improves so much (not dry and no flakiness!). Warming it on your fingers and gently pressing it onto the face helps the cream absorb better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always come back to this. It’s the only moisturizer that I use that minimizes my pores. Too bad it’s so expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The trick to use la mer correctly is rub it on your fingers first then press that to your skin. I've been using this more than 10 years now and it's the only one I always use. Cream for winter gel for summer.  It's the best cream I use, pimple-free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been reading so many negative reviews on here, so I thought I’d chime in too. La Mer is the only cream that actually works on my skin in the winter. I work as a nurse and my hands get so chapped and every cream burns so bad that I have to wash it off. I can apply La Mer to my hands at night and by the morning the redness and pain are about 75% better. I am going to buy another jar bc it lasted so long. I mostly only use it on my hands, but not daily. You don’t need much bc when you rub your hands together it thins out and then you can pat it on. You’re not supposed to put it directly from the jar to your face bc then it will be too thick. I wish it was more affordable bc I’d love to give it to my family and friends to try out. It really is a miracle cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The cream consistency was so thick it was hard to spread evenly! Plus it clogged my pores so much that it broke me out and I never do! Not even when I was a teen. I really don’t get the hype or the exaggerated price! There’s better products out there for so much less that do a way better job

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really looking forward to trying this but honestly not worth the price. I usually use the Drunk Elephant Polypeptide Moisturizer but wanted to try something different to compare, I literally just returned this after a week and purchased the drunk elephant moisturizer again (which I love). This La Mer cream is super thick and you have to use a lot for a decent amount of face coverage, sure it's hydrating but I started to break out after using it a couple times and I had random dry spots on my face, did not sit well under every the smallest amount of of concealer. If you're thinking about it, just don't bother in my opinion.. not worth the hype at all :)

reviews.review_title: Burn your money & the product too
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pathetic product I hated it so much. The cream is very sticky and chip-chip. I hated the formula, god knows why their products are so expensive. It’s just not worth buying, please don’t burn your money just because this is n expensive brand. If you are really looking for a moisturizer go for cetaphil!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looks, feels, and smells like diaper cream. I was so excited to try this sample, but was quite glad I didn’t love due to the hefty price tag.  I must say, it is quite moisturizing ... but there’s other moisturizers that are the full package

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This helps with fine lines and makes my skin look amazing.  I am mid-40s and do not think this would be a good fit for younger skin because it is super moisturizing.  The price is ridiculous, but once you know that a little goes a very long way it averages out.  (The smallest size of this has lasted 6 weeks and counting.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Meh. I don’t see what the hype is about. Trust me, I love to convince myself that I need the expensive products. But this, I think I’ll pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like proactive moisturizer and did not do anything really. So glad i got a sample instead of actually purchasing this. It just sat on my skin and made me feel like a greast mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and I thought this cream would do wonders according to the raving reviews. However, this did nothing to replenish the dryness in-fact it just made my skin greasy. I returned this purchase 5 days later.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for a year now. I’ll discuss my likes and dislikes. My likes for this are: amazing for dry skin in the winter, the ingredients like algae, it helps my thinning skin barrier on my cheeks, it absorbs quickly when warmed up between the fingers or palms of the hands. Do not put it on straight from the spatula to your face. It will not spread well and cause you to press harder than needed to work the product into your facial skin. The scent is a little strong at first, but wears off. It’s almost like a baby powder scent. This is a very thick cream, so you might feel greased for a good 5 minutes, but as it absorbs, it feels light and your skin will feel pillowy and moisturized. This product is extremely expensive and effective. A little goes a long way. It’s tempting to scoop a quarter sized blob, but a dime size at MOST is more than enough for moisturizing. My dislikes are- the absorbtion time takes 15 minutes for me. If I am in a rush to do my makeup, this cream is not a good team player as a prep for that. I’d rather use Tatcha, Lancôme, Tula, Dermologica or First Aid Beauty. They seem to absorb faster as a skin prep step for makeup. This product lasts a long time. I love using this at night because it helps my skin repair itself faster. I like that it doesn’t get on my pillows or clothes, once absorbed. I did purchase this item directly from La Mer as well as the serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best face cream for dry skin. I’ve tried many different ones and this is the only one that has worked. It’s worth the price.

reviews.review_title: great but not worth the money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cream because I had a friend strongly recommend it and saw all the great reviews, and I don’t mind spending extra on products that actually work. I was beyond disappointed with it. At first, the cream was nothing special and no different than the regular moisturizer I use on daily basis. Great for extreme care and to calm the skin esp while traveling and with dehydration and dry spots. But for me its not the worth the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing better. Really works. My skin is on point. Zero complaints

reviews.review_title: Pretty nice for my oily/dehydrated skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Creme de la Mer is one of those products I do not want to like, but sadly my skin really responds well to it. My skin is oily but dehydrated, and this balances me out nicely. I’ve searched quite a bit for something that compares but honestly most other moisturizers fall flat for me, especially when the air gets dry in the winter. Many of the supposed dupes for La Mer are also lackluster for me. If you want to try it I would get a sample first to see if it works for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, great for extreme care and to calm the skin esp while traveling. But this random increase in the price is so unnecessary....

reviews.review_title: a NO for eczema prone dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: eczema prone, dry skin beauties save your coin.   i love luxury, and was introduced to this creme about 12 years ago, when it was gifted to me. at the time i was living on the west coast and assumed that the reason it wasn't moisturizing enough for me was due to the climate. fast forward to present (east coast) - at the recommendation of a well-meaning (?) yt content creator i purchased this last winter when i was going through a period of extreme dry skin due to low humidity/cold weather temperatures, looking for an intense moisturizer to add to my 7-10 step skin care routine. after 2 weeks of slathering this on multiple times a day, i quickly i realized 'this ain't it'.   a friend suggested a couple of k-beauty alternative moisturizers (which i won't name bc sephora doesn't carry them), and within a week of using those my skin was no longer flaky. within 2 weeks of using the alternative i was glowing and highly moisturized.  now that the weather is starting to change again, i felt compelled to finally write a review cautioning my fellow beauties to not blindly invest in this product, and if you do - do not expect miracles. i have since purchased an entire regime for slightly more than the price of this one jar, and my skin has never looked better. my half empty la mer jar is sitting on my beauty counter untouched and unreturned (only bc it's half-empty). whenever i do notice it sitting there, i feel like i've been duped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the creme de la mer for about 3 weeks now and I have noticed a major difference, my skin is getting so smooth, my fine lines has improved noticeably. The price isn’t very appealing but you can’t find a cream like this. Truly the holy grail of creams!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cream because I had a friend strongly recommend it and saw all the great reviews, and I don’t mind spending extra on products that actually work. I was beyond disappointed. :/ At first, the cream was nothing special and no different than the cheaper alternatives. But I kept using it and thought maybe over time I would see the results people rave about, but the already dry zones on my face started to get DRIER and actually start to flake off after using this consistently. My skin has gone back to normal (took a solid two weeks) once I stopped it. Overall, it seems I clearly had a special reaction to it, but regardless, this cream is NOT worth the money. Doesn’t do anything different than a drugstore moisturizer.

reviews.review_title: Best skin product I've ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I treated myself to this about 2 months before my wedding. I have terrible skin and have seen several dermatologists for my cystic acne and excessively dry skin. All of those issues went away within 2 weeks of using this product daily. My dermatologist still can't figure out why the acne went away...but it did! Sadly, I don't have the finances to afford this product all the time :-( Maybe someday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The absolute best!  I was a medical aesthetician and laser technician.   I have used everything... medical grade, department store, and this is my favorite.   The consistency of it will keep your skin younger longer.  It makes your skin look hydrated and luminous.   La Mer sunscreen is fantastic and goes on beautifully with it.  I am in my mid-40's, and look years younger.  I plan on using this to keep the clock away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i really like this cream but honestly it smell n feels like ponds cream idk the difference i thought it kinda is a little over priced for how much cream you get

reviews.review_title: Arrived shattered bottle, Sephora will not replace
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Arrived shattered, didn’t realize until went to open, 97 days from day ordered, 84 days from when arrived to my house. Box didn’t rattle when I took out of shipping box and placed on my shelf. Had no idea shattered bottle until I went to open. Sephora will do nothing for me.  I love the product and have used for years!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s literally Ponds, has a strong scent like something my grandma would use. Very heavy and greasy feeling. Extremely hydrating so it might be a great product for someone with excessively dry skin or if you live in Alaska and maybe the North Pole. Then again you can go with Ponds for a whole lot less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is great! If you have never tried the brand then this is the perfect size to test it out.

reviews.review_title: useless product. does nothing for your skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: just like ponds cold cream. used for over 6 months, 2 bottles down. Not an iota of difference to my skin. wonder what the hype is all about?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my moisturizer to rescue my super dry skin days! It's so good but so expensive. I just tried it but not going to be my routine moisturizer due to its price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have used this off and on for over 25 years.
